original: de ltar rtags med pa ste rtags dang bral ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de ltar rtags med pa ste rtags dang bral ba nyid kyis so //
translated: Thus, by the absence of a reason, that is, by the absence of a mark.

original: byis pa'i bar la ni byis pa'i mthar thug pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: byis pa'i bar la ni byis pa'i mthar thug pa la yang ngo //
translated: Even in the case of a child, that is, even in the case of the final child.

original: skye bos mthong ba ste /
analyzed: skye bos mthong ba ste /
translated: By the seeing of people,

original: mthong ba'i sgo nas yongs su gcod byed nges par byed do //
analyzed: mthong ba'i sgo nas yongs su gcod byed nges par byed do //
translated: by the seeing, one determines the exclusion.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What?

original: mar me la sogs 'jig pa can //
analyzed: mar me la sogs 'jig pa can //
translated: The destruction of a lamp, etc.

original: mar me la sogs pa 'di mi rtag pa yin no zhe'o //
analyzed: mar me la sogs pa 'di mi rtag pa yin no zhe'o //
translated: This lamp, etc. is impermanent.

original: ci 'dra bar gyur pa zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra bar gyur pa zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: 'dra ba med par gzhan 'byung ba gang la 'dra ba med cing mtshungs pa med par skad cig ma gzhan 'byung ba yod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dra ba med par gzhan 'byung ba gang la 'dra ba med cing mtshungs pa med par skad cig ma gzhan 'byung ba yod pa ste /
translated: The arising of another without similarity, that is, the arising of another moment without similarity, without equality.

original: 'dra ba'i skad cig ma gzhan dang mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i skad cig ma gzhan dang mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: it has the nature of not being connected with another moment of similarity.

original: des na sngar 'dra ba gzhan 'byung bas ma nges pa yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: des na sngar 'dra ba gzhan 'byung bas ma nges pa yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should understand that it is not ascertained by the arising of another similarity.

original: ji ltar gang gzung ba na yang nges pa nyid ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gang gzung ba na yang nges pa nyid ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that even when it is apprehended, it is not ascertained?

original: nus pa dngos po'i rang bzhin du //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: nus pa dngos po'i rang bzhin du // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The potency is the nature of the thing itself.

original: rgyu'i nus pa dngos po las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu'i nus pa dngos po las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: The potency of a cause is not different from the thing itself.

original: don gzhan nyid yin na ni phan btags pa med pa'i phyir de'i 'di yin no zhes 'brel pa ma grub pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: don gzhan nyid yin na ni phan btags pa med pa'i phyir de'i 'di yin no zhes 'brel pa ma grub pa'i phyir ram /
translated: If it were different, then since it would not be helpful, it would not be established as related to it, saying ‚Äúthis is that.‚Äù

original: nus pa rnams la nus pa dang ldan pa phan 'dogs par byed pa yin par khas len /
analyzed: nus pa rnams la nus pa dang ldan pa phan 'dogs par byed pa yin par khas len /
translated: If you accept that that which possesses potency is helpful,

original: nus pa la nus pa phan 'dogs par byed pa yin yang /
analyzed: nus pa la nus pa phan 'dogs par byed pa yin yang /
translated: then even though potency is helpful to potency,

original: de tha dad yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: de tha dad yin pa de ltar na /
translated: if they are different,üîΩthen as long as they are different, they are helpful to different potencies.

original: ji srid ji srid du tha dad pa dag nyid kyis nus pa tha dad pa nyid la phan 'dogs par byed do zhes 'dod pa de srid de srid du de'i 'di zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa med pa'i phyir nus pa thug pa med pa yin na de rgyuüîΩnyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid ji srid du tha dad pa dag nyid kyis nus pa tha dad pa nyid la phan 'dogs par byed do zhes 'dod pa de srid de srid du de'i 'di zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa med pa'i phyir nus pa thug pa med pa yin na de rgyu nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since there is no relationship of ‚Äúthis is that,‚Äù potency would be infinite, and it would not be a cause.

original: nus pa rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa dag gis nus pa la phan 'dogs par byed na /
analyzed: nus pa rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa dag gis nus pa la phan 'dogs par byed na /
translated: If potencies that are the nature of themselves are helpful to potency,üîΩthen potency would be infinite.

original: de dang 'dra bar 'bras bu la yang nus pa tha dad pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ba de ltar na /
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar 'bras bu la yang nus pa tha dad pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ba de ltar na /
translated: Likewise, the effect would not have different powers.

original: tha dad par rtogs pa don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir de ni bdag nyid du gyur pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: tha dad par rtogs pa don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir de ni bdag nyid du gyur pa nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, it would be pointless to conceive of them as different, so they would be identical.

original: de'i phyir nus pa dngos po'i rang bzhin du gyur kyang /
analyzed: de'i phyir nus pa dngos po'i rang bzhin du gyur kyang /
translated: Therefore, although the power is the nature of the thing,

original: 'bras bu'i yul la rgyu'i nus pa gang yin pa de yul du gyur pa yin na /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i yul la rgyu'i nus pa gang yin pa de yul du gyur pa yin na /
translated: if the power of the cause with respect to the object of the effect is the object,

original: 'bras bu la rmongs rgyu mthong @163b ba na nus pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa de gzung na yang nges pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu la rmongs rgyu mthong @163b ba na nus pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa de gzung na yang nges pa med pa yin te /
translated: then even if one apprehends the power that is the nature of the cause that is obscured with respect to the effect, there is no certainty.

original: de la rnam par rmongs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la rnam par rmongs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: One would be confused about it.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: mthong ba med phyir ro ma mthong ba yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba med phyir ro ma mthong ba yang gang zhe na /
translated: Because it is not seen. What is not seen?

original: de ma thag med de 'bras bu de ma thag pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ma thag med de 'bras bu de ma thag pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The absence of the antecedent condition, because the effect is absent immediately after it. This is the meaning.

original: nus pa chod pa can gyi rgyu de 'dra ba de yin na gang gi de ma thag pa'i 'bras bu mi skye zhing mi skye na snang bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: nus pa chod pa can gyi rgyu de 'dra ba de yin na gang gi de ma thag pa'i 'bras bu mi skye zhing mi skye na snang bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the cause is such that its potency is cut off, then the effect that would immediately follow it will not arise, and if it does not arise, it will not appear.

original: de ma thag ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa chos mthun pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir nges byed kyi skyes bu la rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir gyi gsal med phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma thag ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa chos mthun pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir nges byed kyi skyes bu la rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir gyi gsal med phyir ro //
translated: Because the immediately preceding condition is not seen, and because it is similar to that which does not have the effect of that, the person who ascertains it is not illuminated by the analysis.

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir de la rnam par nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir de la rnam par nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because of delusion, there is no ascertainment of it.

original: de'i phyir rnam par rmongs pa de nyid bzlog pa'i ched du ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par rmongs pa de nyid bzlog pa'i ched du ni /
translated: Therefore, in order to stop that very confusion,

original: rjes su dpag pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa brjod pa yin /
translated: inference is stated.

original: de lta ma yin na gal te ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du dngos po de kho na nyid thams cad la yang sgro btags pas nges pa la gags byed pa med pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gal te ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du dngos po de kho na nyid thams cad la yang sgro btags pas nges pa la gags byed pa med pa de'i tshe /
translated: If that were not so, if all things were just as they are seen, and if there were no obstruction to ascertainment by superimposition,

original: rjes su dpag pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas ci zhig bya /
translated: then what would inference do?

original: blo gros chen po sgro btags pas mchod pa gang yin pa blo gros chen po la yangs pa can de dag gis mthong nyid las te gzigs pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po'i nus pa rnam pa thams cad nges par byed cing nges par mdzad par ro //
analyzed: blo gros chen po sgro btags pas mchod pa gang yin pa blo gros chen po la yangs pa can de dag gis mthong nyid las te gzigs pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po'i nus pa rnam pa thams cad nges par byed cing nges par mdzad par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúMahƒÅmati, the worship by superimposition is because of the very seeing of those of VaibhƒÅ·π£ika, MahƒÅmati, who are making a determination of the power of things in every way.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir thams cad las ni log pa'i /
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad las ni log pa'i /
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúfrom all,‚Äù

original: rigs mthun pa dang rigs mi mthun pa de dang de las log pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa dang rigs mi mthun pa de dang de las log pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: from this and that similar and dissimilar class, ‚Äúthe nature of the opposite,‚Äù that is, the nature of the exclusion, ‚Äúis ascertained.‚Äù

original: rnam par gnas pa'i rang bzhin can gyi don de la ni /
analyzed: rnam par gnas pa'i rang bzhin can gyi don de la ni /
translated: The meaning of the ‚Äúnature of the opposite‚Äù is as follows.

original: ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi blo rnam par gcod pa de dang de la brten pa'i rnam par rtog pa don dam par tha dad pa med pa de la yag /üîΩtha dad rten can bzhin 'jug ste /
analyzed: ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi blo rnam par gcod pa de dang de la brten pa'i rnam par rtog pa don dam par tha dad pa med pa de la yag / tha dad rten can bzhin 'jug ste /
translated: The cognition that is the reason for the exclusion, which is based on this and that, is ultimately non-different from the conceptual thought that is based on it.üîΩIt operates as if it had a different object.

original: yul tha dad pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa bzhin du'o //
translated: As if it had a different object.

original: gang dang gang las dngos po log pa de dang de la ltos nas dngos po gzhan las log pa gang yin pa de la brten nas rang bzhin tha dad pa med na yang dngos po'i rang bzhin de dang de la tha dad pa bzhin du ston par byed
analyzed: gang dang gang las dngos po log pa de dang de la ltos nas dngos po gzhan las log pa gang yin pa de la brten nas rang bzhin tha dad pa med na yang dngos po'i rang bzhin de dang de la tha dad pa bzhin du ston par byed
translated: In dependence on the thing that is the opposite of this or that, that which is the opposite of that thing is different from that thing.

original: pa'i blo 'jug par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: pa'i blo 'jug par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Even though there is no difference in their natures, the mind engages in the appearance of difference in the natures of those things.

original: dngos po yang de 'dra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po yang de 'dra ba ma yin no //
translated: But things are not like that.

original: de de ltar na blo 'jug pa yod na /
analyzed: de de ltar na blo 'jug pa yod na /
translated: If the mind engages in that way,

original: ji skad du brjod sgra 'jug 'gyur //
analyzed: ji skad du brjod sgra 'jug 'gyur //
translated: then the term that is used will engage in that way.

original: de dang de las tha dad pa de dang de la de'i tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de dang de las tha dad pa de dang de la de'i tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to make known the difference of this or that from this or that,

original: brdar @164a * //
analyzed: brdar @164a * //
translated: a convention is made.

original: byas pa gang dang gang yin pa de dang de'i ngor byas nas /
analyzed: byas pa gang dang gang yin pa de dang de'i ngor byas nas /
translated: In dependence on that convention,

original: brda ji lta ba bzhin du sgra yang tha dad pa kho nar 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brda ji lta ba bzhin du sgra yang tha dad pa kho nar 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: the term engages in just that difference.

original: de dang de las /
analyzed: de dang de las /
translated: From this or that

original: ldog pa'i dngos po de yis ni //
analyzed: ldog pa'i dngos po de yis ni //
translated: the thing that is the opposite of this or that

original: ngo bo nyid kyis blo skyed 'gyur //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis blo skyed 'gyur //
translated: produces the cognition of its own nature.

original: rang bzhin gyis rang gi rnam pa dag las nges pa'i blo skyed par byed do //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis rang gi rnam pa dag las nges pa'i blo skyed par byed do //
translated: It generates a cognition that ascertains its own nature from its own particular aspect.

original: ngo bo ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ngo bo ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is its nature?

original: rang dang ni rjes su mthun pa'i ste /
analyzed: rang dang ni rjes su mthun pa'i ste /
translated: It is similar to itself.

original: de'i bdag nyid ji ltar gnas pa de kho na bzhin du skyed par byed do //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ji ltar gnas pa de kho na bzhin du skyed par byed do //
translated: It generates itself in just the way that it exists.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: When?

original: 'khrul rgyu med na /
analyzed: 'khrul rgyu med na /
translated: When there is no cause of error.

original: rgyu nges pa goms pa la sogs pa yod na'o //
analyzed: rgyu nges pa goms pa la sogs pa yod na'o //
translated: When there is a cause of ascertainment, such as habituation.

original: de de ltar na dngos po nyid mi rtag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de de ltar na dngos po nyid mi rtag pa nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, impermanence is a real entity.

original: 'dra ba gzhan dang mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i ngang tshul can de 'dzin pa na /
analyzed: 'dra ba gzhan dang mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i ngang tshul can de 'dzin pa na /
translated: When it is apprehended as having the character of not connecting with another similar one,

original: mngon sum gyis mi rtag pa nyid grub pa yin no zhes rang nyid kyi 'dod pa bstan nas /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis mi rtag pa nyid grub pa yin no zhes rang nyid kyi 'dod pa bstan nas /
translated: impermanence is established by direct perception.

original: rang gi sde pa kha cig zhig nas med pa mi rtag pa nyid du 'dod pa ji ltar grub pa de bstan pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i rtags dag las zhes bya ba la sogs pas de ston par byed do //
analyzed: rang gi sde pa kha cig zhig nas med pa mi rtag pa nyid du 'dod pa ji ltar grub pa de bstan pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i rtags dag las zhes bya ba la sogs pas de ston par byed do //
translated: Having thus taught his own belief, in order to demonstrate how some Buddhist schools maintain that impermanence is the nonexistence of what has passed away, he says, ‚ÄúFrom nonapprehension as a reason,‚Äù and so on.

original: yang mi rtag pa nyid ni dngos po nyid dam /
analyzed: yang mi rtag pa nyid ni dngos po nyid dam /
translated: Moreover, impermanence is not established by direct perception.

original: mngon sum gyis grub pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis grub pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not established by direct perception.

original: zhig nas med pas mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ba ni bla ste /
analyzed: zhig nas med pas mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ba ni bla ste /
translated: It is better to say that impermanence is established by the non-existence of a thing that has been destroyed.

original: de ltar na yang skad cig ma tha ma mthong ba'i dus 'di la'ang 'jig pa grub /
analyzed: de ltar na yang skad cig ma tha ma mthong ba'i dus 'di la'ang 'jig pa grub /
translated: In that case, destruction is established at the time of seeing the last moment of a thing.

original: de yang mi rtag pa nyid kyi ming can yin no //
analyzed: de yang mi rtag pa nyid kyi ming can yin no //
translated: And that is called impermanence.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: mi dmigs pa'i rtags dag las skad cig ma tha ma dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gyur pa phyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir mi rtag pa grub pa yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rtags dag las skad cig ma tha ma dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gyur pa phyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir mi rtag pa grub pa yin no //
translated: Impermanence is established from the evidence of non-apprehension, because what has been apprehended by the characteristic of the last moment does not appear later.

original: de ltar na /üîΩdngos po sngar byung med 'gyur pa //
analyzed: de ltar na / dngos po sngar byung med 'gyur pa //
translated: Thus:üîΩIt is taught that a thing is impermanent

original: mi rtag ces ni bstan pa yin //
analyzed: mi rtag ces ni bstan pa yin //
translated: Because it did not exist before.

original: sngar snang bar gyur pa las phyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sngar snang bar gyur pa las phyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it does not appear later, after it has appeared before,

original: shes pa med pa na dngos po 'di mi rtag ces bya bar rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: shes pa med pa na dngos po 'di mi rtag ces bya bar rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: it is established that this thing is impermanent when it is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi mi rtag pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi mi rtag pa nyid yin na /
translated: If impermanence has the characteristic of non-existence,

original: med pa la ltos nas dngos po 'di'i mi rtag pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i tha dad pa'i tha snyad thob pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa rigs pa la sogs pa gang gi mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgra yin na'o //
analyzed: med pa la ltos nas dngos po 'di'i mi rtag pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i tha dad pa'i tha snyad thob pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa rigs pa la sogs pa gang gi mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgra yin na'o //
translated: and in dependence on the non-existent, the impermanence of this entity is not obtained as a different convention.

original: ci zhig 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can brjod ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can brjod ce na /
translated: What is the nature of the one who desires to speak?

original: mtha' gnyis chos yod dang / 'brel pa brjod pa'i ngang tshul can //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis chos yod dang / 'brel pa brjod pa'i ngang tshul can //
translated: The nature of the one who desires to speak is the one who has the two extremes and the one who has the connection.

original: mtha' yang de yin la gnyis kyang yin pas na @164b mtha' gnyis so //
analyzed: mtha' yang de yin la gnyis kyang yin pas na @164b mtha' gnyis so //
translated: It is an extreme and it is two, thus it is the two extremes.

original: mtha' rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mtha' rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is of two kinds.

original: da ltar gyis chod pa ni mtha' gnyis po de la chod pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar gyis chod pa ni mtha' gnyis po de la chod pa'o //
translated: The present is cut off from those two extremes.

original: mtha' gnyis po chod pa ni mtha' gnyis chod pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis po chod pa ni mtha' gnyis chod pa'o //
translated: The two extremes are cut off, thus it is the cutting off of the two extremes.

original: mtha' gnyis chod pa yang de yin la yod pa nyid kyang yin pa de ltar na'o //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis chod pa yang de yin la yod pa nyid kyang yin pa de ltar na'o //
translated: The cutting off of the two extremes is also that, and it is existence, thus it is that.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i yod pa de yang mi rtag pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i yod pa de yang mi rtag pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: That existence which has become like that is impermanence.

original: yod pa tsam nyid ni mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa tsam nyid ni mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: Mere existence is not the characteristic of impermanence,

original: nam mkha' la sogs pa yang de dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa yang de dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because space and so on would also be impermanent, since they possess it.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: snga nas med pa dang / zhig nas med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi mtha' gnyis kyi khyad par du gyur pa dbus na gnas pa'i yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi rtag pa nyid yin pa'am /
analyzed: snga nas med pa dang / zhig nas med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi mtha' gnyis kyi khyad par du gyur pa dbus na gnas pa'i yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi rtag pa nyid yin pa'am /
translated: The existence that is the middle between the two extremes, the characteristic of nonexistence prior to and subsequent to destruction, is impermanence.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i yod pa nyid kyi 'phrod pa 'du ba nyid ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i yod pa nyid kyi 'phrod pa 'du ba nyid ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Or, the existence that is like that is not the mere conjunction of the two.

original: de skad du smra ba des mtha' gnyis kyi dbus na gnas pa'i yod pa nyid gang yin pa des de'i mtha' zhes 'dod pa gang /
analyzed: de skad du smra ba des mtha' gnyis kyi dbus na gnas pa'i yod pa nyid gang yin pa des de'i mtha' zhes 'dod pa gang /
translated: What is the middle between the two extremes that you assert to be its extremes?

original: de'i rigs pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs nas gang la 'di skad ces 'dri bar mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rigs pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs nas gang la 'di skad ces 'dri bar mdzad pa yin no //
translated: Thinking that this is not reasonable, he asks, ‚ÄúWhat is it?‚Äù

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is the case, but

original: gal te snga phyi med yin yang //
analyzed: gal te snga phyi med yin yang //
translated: if it is not prior or subsequent,üîΩwhat is the middle?

original: 'di la / 'dri bar bya ba ci zhig yod //
analyzed: 'di la / 'dri bar bya ba ci zhig yod //
translated: Here, what is there to be asked?

original: snga na med pa dang / phyi nas med pa zhes bya ba gnyis po 'di la mtha' zhes brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: snga na med pa dang / phyi nas med pa zhes bya ba gnyis po 'di la mtha' zhes brjod do zhe na /
translated: The two, called ‚Äúnon-existence prior to‚Äù and ‚Äúnon-existence after,‚Äù are called ‚Äúextremes.‚Äù

original: gal te de lta yin na snga na med pa dang / phyi nas med nyid dngos po mi rtag cis ma yin /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin na snga na med pa dang / phyi nas med nyid dngos po mi rtag cis ma yin /
translated: If that is so, why is non-existence prior to and non-existence after not impermanence of things?

original: ci'i phyir mi 'dod do //
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi 'dod do //
translated: Why is it not accepted?

original: de nyid mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: de nyid mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: That itself would be impermanence.

original: brgyud pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: brgyud pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the use of this series?

original: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
analyzed: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
translated: Commentary on Valid Knowledge

original: bam po nyi shu drug pa /
analyzed: bam po nyi shu drug pa /
translated: Book Twenty-Six

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: That may be so,

original: gal te drug sogs mi rung phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gal te drug sogs mi rung phyir zhe na /
translated: but if you say, ‚ÄúBecause six, etc., are not possible,‚Äù

original: gal te med pa mi rtag pa yin pa de'i tshe de'i sgo nas dngos po'i tha dad pa mi rung ba'i phyir 'di'i mi rtag pa nyid 'di yin no zhes tha dad par brjod pa'i ngang tshul can gyi drug pa mi rung ngo //
analyzed: gal te med pa mi rtag pa yin pa de'i tshe de'i sgo nas dngos po'i tha dad pa mi rung ba'i phyir 'di'i mi rtag pa nyid 'di yin no zhes tha dad par brjod pa'i ngang tshul can gyi drug pa mi rung ngo //
translated: if non-existence is impermanent, then because it is not possible to differentiate things by means of that, the sixth, which has the mode of differentiating by saying, ‚ÄúThis is its impermanence,‚Äù is not possible.

original: sogs pa smos pas bdun pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang / chos dang chos can gyi dngos po'i tha snyad ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas bdun pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang / chos dang chos can gyi dngos po'i tha snyad ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù includes the seventh case, the sixth case, and so on, and the conventions of the property and the possessor of the property.

original: mtha' de ji ltar 'gyur gal te med pa'i phyir dngos po la drug pa la sogs pa mi rung ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: mtha' de ji ltar 'gyur gal te med pa'i phyir dngos po la drug pa la sogs pa mi rung ba de'i tshe /
translated: How could that be the case? If it is not tenable that the sixth case, etc., apply to things because they do not exist,

original: de yod pa nyid dam de dang 'brel @165a * //
analyzed: de yod pa nyid dam de dang 'brel @165a * //
translated: then when one applies the terms ‚Äúexistence,‚Äù ‚Äúrelation,‚Äù

original: pa'am gzhan la lar snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa de dag sbyor ba na yang /
analyzed: pa'am gzhan la lar snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa de dag sbyor ba na yang /
translated: ‚Äúprior nonexistence,‚Äù and ‚Äúposterior nonexistence‚Äù to something,

original: drug pa la sogs pa mi rung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: drug pa la sogs pa mi rung bar 'gyur te /
translated: the sixth case, etc., would not be tenable.

original: dngos po gzhan du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po gzhan du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is because there would be no difference between things.

original: gzhan yang yod pa nyid rtag pa yin na yod pa dang 'brel ba yang rtag pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang yod pa nyid rtag pa yin na yod pa dang 'brel ba yang rtag pa nyid yin te /
translated: Moreover, if existence is permanent, then that which is related to existence would also be permanent.

original: de dag ni yod nyid dang 'brel rtag nyid phyir /üîΩrgyu'i phyir de dag gi snga na med pa'am /
analyzed: de dag ni yod nyid dang 'brel rtag nyid phyir / rgyu'i phyir de dag gi snga na med pa'am /
translated: Because they are related to permanent existence,

original: zhig gnas med pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: zhig gnas med pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: prior nonexistence and posterior nonexistence would not exist.

original: rang gi ngo bo nyams pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyams pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because their own nature would be impaired.

original: de na de dag gi tha ma dag tu yod pa nyid dang 'brel ba dag gi khyad par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de na de dag gi tha ma dag tu yod pa nyid dang 'brel ba dag gi khyad par rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable to distinguish them as existing at the end, because

original: dper na snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa la yod pa nyid la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa la yod pa nyid la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: they are like nonexistence prior to and subsequent to a pot.

original: sbyor ba ni gang mi rtag par mi 'gyur ba de ni snga na med pa dang / zhig nas med pa dag tu khyad par don dam par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang mi rtag par mi 'gyur ba de ni snga na med pa dang / zhig nas med pa dag tu khyad par don dam par rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: The syllogism is: Whatever is not impermanent is not reasonable as a distinction between nonexistence prior to and subsequent to a pot in an ultimate sense,

original: dper na nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: like space.üîΩThe nonexistence of the pervasion is: Whatever exists is not impermanent.

original: yod pa nyid dang 'brel pa yang mi rtag par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang 'brel pa yang mi rtag par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the nonapprehension of the pervader.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is true, but

original: gal te rgyu 'bras mtha' yin na /
analyzed: gal te rgyu 'bras mtha' yin na /
translated: if cause and effect are the end,

original: snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa'i tha ma khyad par du gyur pa ma yin pa gang gis skyon 'di yod /
analyzed: snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa'i tha ma khyad par du gyur pa ma yin pa gang gis skyon 'di yod /
translated: then what is the fault in distinguishing nonexistence prior to and subsequent to a pot as not being the end?

original: 'od ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'od ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of this?

original: dngos po'i rgyu ni mtha' gcig yin la /
analyzed: dngos po'i rgyu ni mtha' gcig yin la /
translated: The cause of an entity is one end,üîΩand its cessation is the other end.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni mtha' gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni mtha' gnyis pa yin no //
translated: The result of that is the second extreme.üîΩTherefore, there is no difference between the final cause and effect.

original: des na rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i tha ma dag tu khyad par yod pa ma yin no snyam pa 'dis phyogs gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba yin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i tha ma dag tu khyad par yod pa ma yin no snyam pa 'dis phyogs gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba yin no //
translated: This is the anticipation of an objection from another position.

original: gal te de lta yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If that is so,

original: khyad par med pa nyid 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyad par med pa nyid 'gyur te /
translated: then there would be no difference.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i tha ma la khyad par nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i tha ma la khyad par nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: There would be no difference between the final cause and effect.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'brel med phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel med phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no connection.

original: khyod kyi 'dod pas dngos po la snga na med pa dang lhan cig dngos po snga na med pa zhes bya pa'i tha snyad kyi 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyod kyi 'dod pas dngos po la snga na med pa dang lhan cig dngos po snga na med pa zhes bya pa'i tha snyad kyi 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: According to your assertion, there is no connection between the prior nonexistence of a thing and the thing itself, and the convention of prior nonexistence.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin pa de ni /
translated: The application is this: That which does not have a connection with something

original: de'i zhes bya ba'i don dam pa'i tha snyad rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba'i don dam pa'i tha snyad rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: is not suitable to be the ultimate referent of the expression ‚Äúthat of this,‚Äù

original: dper na nam mkha' dang dus lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' dang dus lta bu'o //
translated: like space and time.

original: dngos po dang snga na med par yang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang snga na med par yang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: Nor is there a relation between an entity and a prior nonexistence. This is the nonobservation of a pervader.

original: de ltar na rigs pa pa de dngos po snga @165b na med pa 'dod ma yin /
analyzed: de ltar na rigs pa pa de dngos po snga @165b na med pa 'dod ma yin /
translated: Thus, the rationalist does not accept a prior nonexistence of an entity.

original: gang gi tshe 'di ltar dngos po'i snga na med pa mi 'dod pa de'i tshe rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di ltar dngos po'i snga na med pa mi 'dod pa de'i tshe rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ma yin no //
translated: When he does not accept a prior nonexistence of an entity, then cause and effect are not possible.

original: de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ni snga ma med pa la ltos nas 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ni snga ma med pa la ltos nas 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: Thus, cause and effect are dependent on prior nonexistence.

original: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: They are not in any other way.

original: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni 'ga' zhig thag nye ba na sngar med pa las 'byung ba gang yin pa de 'bras bu yin na /
analyzed: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni 'ga' zhig thag nye ba na sngar med pa las 'byung ba gang yin pa de 'bras bu yin na /
translated: That which is called an effect is an entity that arises from a prior nonexistence when it is near.

original: gang yang snga na med pa ma yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang yang snga na med pa ma yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin no //
translated: That which is not a prior nonexistence does not arise.

original: gang gi tshe mi skye ba de'i tshe de 'bras bu ma yin zhing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mi skye ba de'i tshe de 'bras bu ma yin zhing /
translated: When it does not arise, then it is not an effect.

original: gang gi tshe de 'bras bu ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de 'bras bu ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it is not an effect,

original: cung zad kyang mi byed la /
analyzed: cung zad kyang mi byed la /
translated: it does not perform any function.

original: gang mi byed pa 'di la 'bras bu yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang mi byed pa 'di la 'bras bu yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no effect here that is not produced.

original: 'bras bu nyid ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not an effect, it is not a cause.

original: de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu de dag kyang 'di dngos po la grub pa min no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu de dag kyang 'di dngos po la grub pa min no //
translated: Thus, those causes and effects are not established in reality.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What are they like?

original: khyad par can de zhes bya can zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: khyad par can de zhes bya can zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The one with a distinction is the one called ‚Äúthat.‚Äù

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tha snyad gang la snga na med pa'i khyad par te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tha snyad gang la snga na med pa'i khyad par te /
translated: The convention of cause and effect is where there is a distinction of non-existence before.

original: bye brag yod pa de ni khyad par can de'o //
analyzed: bye brag yod pa de ni khyad par can de'o //
translated: That is the one with a distinction.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa gang la khyad par can de zhes bya ba yod pa de ni khyad par can de zhes bya ba can no //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa gang la khyad par can de zhes bya ba yod pa de ni khyad par can de zhes bya ba can no //
translated: The one that is a cause and effect where there is the one called ‚Äúthat‚Äù is the one called ‚Äúthat.‚Äù

original: snga na med pa la brten nas /
analyzed: snga na med pa la brten nas /
translated: In dependence on non-existence before,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tha snyad ni thob pa can gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tha snyad ni thob pa can gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu grub pa ma yin te /
translated: the convention of cause and effect is not the establishment of the cause and effect that is obtained.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i rigs pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i rigs pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is ‚Äúby the reasoning that has been explained.‚Äù

original: sbyor ba dag kyang gang zhig snga na med pa yod pa ma yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba dag kyang gang zhig snga na med pa yod pa ma yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin te /
translated: The application is this: that which does not exist prior to its existence is not produced.

original: dper na nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: For example, like space.

original: dngos po la yang snga na med pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po la yang snga na med pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
translated: And it is not the case that an existent thing does not exist prior to its existence. This is the observation of a contradictory property.

original: gang mi skye ba de ni 'bras bu ma yin te /
analyzed: gang mi skye ba de ni 'bras bu ma yin te /
translated: That which is not produced is not an effect.

original: dper na nam mkha' de nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' de nyid lta bu'o //
translated: For example, like that very space.

original: dngos po snga na med pa dang bral ba yang skye ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po snga na med pa dang bral ba yang skye ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: And it is not the case that an existent thing, devoid of prior non-existence, is produced. This is the non-observation of a pervader.

original: gang la 'bras bu med pa de ni rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: gang la 'bras bu med pa de ni rgyu ma yin te /
translated: That which does not have an effect is not a cause.

original: dper na gtan nas med pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na gtan nas med pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, like the utterly non-existent.

original: dngos por mngon bar 'dod pas yang 'bras bu med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos por mngon bar 'dod pas yang 'bras bu med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: And it is not the case that an existent thing does not have an effect. This is the non-observation of a pervader.

original: yod nyid rang rgyu dang 'brel pa //
analyzed: yod nyid rang rgyu dang 'brel pa //
translated: Existence is related to its cause

original: byed pa'i phyir ni rgyu yin lo //
analyzed: byed pa'i phyir ni rgyu yin lo //
translated: because it is produced.

original: khyed kyis ci 'dra pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba bstan pa de 'dra ba ni /
analyzed: khyed kyis ci 'dra pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba bstan pa de 'dra ba ni /
translated: You have taught that the birth of an effect is like that of a sprout, but

original: dngos po skye bar byed pa'i phyir rgyu zhes mi bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po skye bar byed pa'i phyir rgyu zhes mi bya'o //
translated: a cause is not so called because it produces an existent effect.

original: @166a * // 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: @166a * // 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: yod pa nyid dang lhan cig 'bras bu'i don 'brel cing ldan pa ste /
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang lhan cig 'bras bu'i don 'brel cing ldan pa ste /
translated: An existent effect is related to and connected with its cause.

original: 'phrod pa 'du ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúrelated‚Äù is ‚Äúto meet‚Äù or ‚Äúto join.‚Äù

original: yang na rang gi rgyu dang 'bras bu de 'brel pa gang yin pa de ni skye bar 'dod do //
analyzed: yang na rang gi rgyu dang 'bras bu de 'brel pa gang yin pa de ni skye bar 'dod do //
translated: Or, that which is related to its cause and effect is asserted to be birth.

original: 'o na de lta na ni /
analyzed: 'o na de lta na ni /
translated: But if that is so,

original: yong nyid de yod pa nyid dang rgyu dag 'brel pa de yang /
analyzed: yong nyid de yod pa nyid dang rgyu dag 'brel pa de yang /
translated: then the relation of an existent effect to its cause

original: dngos po gnyis de dag kyang rtag yin /
analyzed: dngos po gnyis de dag kyang rtag yin /
translated: would be a permanent entity.

original: 'o na 'dir 'bras ci /
analyzed: 'o na 'dir 'bras ci /
translated: What then is the point of an effect?

original: yod pa nyid dang 'brel par dang rgyu dang 'brel ba la skye bar khas len pa na /
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang 'brel par dang rgyu dang 'brel ba la skye bar khas len pa na /
translated: When one accepts that an existent effect is related to its cause and that which is related to its cause is birth,

original: re zhig yod pa nyid ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig yod pa nyid ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir byed pa ma yin no //
translated: then first an existent effect is not a producer because it is permanent.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'brel pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'brel pa yang ma yin no //
translated: For that very reason, it is not related to its cause.

original: de bas na cung zad kyang mi byed pa de ltar na /üîΩgang gis gang skyed par byed pas rgyu yin /
analyzed: de bas na cung zad kyang mi byed pa de ltar na / gang gis gang skyed par byed pas rgyu yin /
translated: Therefore, it is not a cause.üîΩWhat is a cause of what?

original: gang med pa de byas pa yin /
analyzed: gang med pa de byas pa yin /
translated: What is produced by what?

original: bdag nyid yod pa ma yin pa de rgyus byas pa min na /
analyzed: bdag nyid yod pa ma yin pa de rgyus byas pa min na /
translated: If it is not produced by a cause, because it does not exist by itself,

original: dngos po snga med ldan min te //
analyzed: dngos po snga med ldan min te //
translated: then an entity does not exist prior to its cause.

original: dngos po la snga na med pa yod ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po la snga na med pa yod ba ma yin no //
translated: An entity does not exist prior to its cause.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'brel pa khas mi len phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa khas mi len phyir ro //
translated: Because we do not accept a relation.

original: snga na med pa dang lhan cig 'brel pa khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga na med pa dang lhan cig 'brel pa khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: We do not accept a relation prior to or simultaneous with .

original: de bas na gang gi phyir dngos po snga na med pa dang / bral ba de nyid kyi phyir byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gang gi phyir dngos po snga na med pa dang / bral ba de nyid kyi phyir byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because an entity does not exist prior to its cause, it is not produced.

original: 'bras bu nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir ril 'di rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir ril 'di rtag pa yin te /
translated: Because it is not an effect, it is permanent.

original: thob pa de ltar na 'ga' zhig kyang mi rtag pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob pa de ltar na 'ga' zhig kyang mi rtag pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, nothing would be impermanent.

original: sbyor ba dag ni gang snga na med pa ma yin pa de ni byas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba dag ni gang snga na med pa ma yin pa de ni byas pa ma yin te /
translated: The argument is this: What is not prior to its cause is not produced,

original: dper na nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: like space.

original: dngos po yad snga na med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa dang gang 'bras bu ma yin pa de ni mi rtag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po yad snga na med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa dang gang 'bras bu ma yin pa de ni mi rtag pa ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe thing is not nonexistent prior to the existence of the effect‚Äù is the non-observation of the pervader. ‚ÄúThat which is not an effect is not impermanent,

original: dper na nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: like space.‚Äù

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po yang 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa ste thal ba bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po yang 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa ste thal ba bsgrub pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe thing that is the object of desire is not an effect‚Äù is the observation of the contradictory of the pervader. The reductio is established.

original: gang gi tshe 'di ltar dngos po'i snga na med pa la sogs pa'i 'brel ba khas mi len pa de'i tshe skyon yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di ltar dngos po'i snga na med pa la sogs pa'i 'brel ba khas mi len pa de'i tshe skyon yin no //
translated: When one does not accept the relation of the nonexistence of the thing prior to its existence, then there is a fault.

original: de'i phyir sgra gang dag la tha dad pa med pa'i don du mngon par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra gang dag la tha dad pa med pa'i don du mngon par 'dod pa ste /
translated: Therefore, with regard to those sounds that are asserted to have the meaning of nondifference,üîΩfor example, ‚ÄúThe thing that did not exist previously exists,‚Äù and so on,

original: dper na dngos po snga na med pa yod do zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: dper na dngos po snga na med pa yod do zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yin pa de ltar na /
translated: in that case,

original: tha dad med don mngon 'dod can //
analyzed: tha dad med don mngon 'dod can //
translated: those who assert the meaning of nondifference

original: sgra la'ang yul du gyur pa de dag la //
analyzed: sgra la'ang yul du gyur pa de dag la //
translated: with regard to those sounds that are the objects

original: ldog pa ni rten yin te ldog pa'i rgyu @166b yin no //
analyzed: ldog pa ni rten yin te ldog pa'i rgyu @166b yin no //
translated: The exclusion is the basis, because it is the cause of the exclusion.

original: blo de nyid ni rnam par rtog pa'i blo nyid do //
analyzed: blo de nyid ni rnam par rtog pa'i blo nyid do //
translated: That cognition is the conceptual cognition.

original: don med / zhen pa ni dngos por gyur pa'i rten dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: don med / zhen pa ni dngos por gyur pa'i rten dang bral ba'o //
translated: The object is nonexistent, because it is devoid of the basis that is the entity.

original: brjod bya tha dad tshul can ni gang la brjod bya'i don tha dad pa'i ngang tshul yod pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: brjod bya tha dad tshul can ni gang la brjod bya'i don tha dad pa'i ngang tshul yod pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The different expressions are the different modes of expression, that is, the different words.

original: don tha dad pa med na yang brda'i ngor byas nas don la tha dad pa bzhin du zhen par byed pas na /
analyzed: don tha dad pa med na yang brda'i ngor byas nas don la tha dad pa bzhin du zhen par byed pas na /
translated: Even when there is no difference in the object, one is attached to a difference in the object, as if it were a difference in the signifier, because of the difference in the signifier.

original: ldog pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ldog pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, it is the reason for the convention of exclusion. This is the meaning.

original: dngos por gyur pa'i 'brel pa rten ma yin pa yang 'brel pa brtag par ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par bstan zin pa de ltar na 'dir ma bstan to //
analyzed: dngos por gyur pa'i 'brel pa rten ma yin pa yang 'brel pa brtag par ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par bstan zin pa de ltar na 'dir ma bstan to //
translated: The non-basis of the entity-relation has been taught in detail just as it is in the Examination of Relations. Therefore, it is not taught here.

original: 'o na gang 'di mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam par kha dog la sogs pa 'dzin pa yin pa de ji ltar zhes bya ba'i lan bshad nas /
analyzed: 'o na gang 'di mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam par kha dog la sogs pa 'dzin pa yin pa de ji ltar zhes bya ba'i lan bshad nas /
translated: Now, if it is asked, ‚ÄúHow is it that this consciousness apprehends color and so on in the aspect of impermanence and so on?‚Äù

original: de ni du mar zhes bya ba'i lan gdab par bzhed nas skad cig re rer zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ni du mar zhes bya ba'i lan gdab par bzhed nas skad cig re rer zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The answer to that is as follows:üîΩThe answer to the question, ‚ÄúHow is it that this consciousness apprehends color and so on in the aspect of impermanence and so on?‚ÄùüîΩis explained as follows:

original: khyad par ngo shes ni sngar yongs su mthong ba'i rtags las ngo shes pa gang yin pa de ni de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par ngo shes ni sngar yongs su mthong ba'i rtags las ngo shes pa gang yin pa de ni de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: The recognition of a particular is that which recognizes something from a previously seen sign. That is called ‚Äúthis is that very thing.‚Äù

original: de ni tshad ma nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni tshad ma nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: That is not valid cognition.

original: 'on kyang 'khrul pa'i shes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'khrul pa'i shes pa yin no //
translated: However, it is a mistaken consciousness.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: skad cig re rer tha dad phyir mthong ba gang yin pa de ni 'gag pa yin la de nyid ni gzhan yin te /
analyzed: skad cig re rer tha dad phyir mthong ba gang yin pa de ni 'gag pa yin la de nyid ni gzhan yin te /
translated: Because it is different in every moment. What is seen has ceased. That very thing is different.

original: phyis gzhan la de ma yin pa la de nyid 'di yin no zhes 'dzin pa ni 'khrul pa'i shes pa yin no //
analyzed: phyis gzhan la de ma yin pa la de nyid 'di yin no zhes 'dzin pa ni 'khrul pa'i shes pa yin no //
translated: Later, when it apprehends something else as that very thing, it is a mistaken consciousness.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi ji ltar mthong ba nyid kyi khyad pa la de bzung ba ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang spyi yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi ji ltar mthong ba nyid kyi khyad pa la de bzung ba ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang spyi yin no zhe na /
translated: Granted that this is so, but the particular is not apprehended as it is seen, but rather as a universal.

original: gal te de lta yin na khyad par yul can ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de lta yin na khyad par yul can ma yin no //
translated: If this is so, then the particular is not the object of the inference.

original: rjes su dpag pa de ni khyad par mthong ba zhes brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa de ni khyad par mthong ba zhes brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: And the inference cannot be said to have a particular as its object.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩmthong ba mtshungs pa de 'dzin phyir //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / mthong ba mtshungs pa de 'dzin phyir //
translated: Why not?üîΩBecause it apprehends what is similar to what is seen.

original: snga phyir mthong ba'i phyis phyi ma 'dzin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa de ni spyi mthong ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snga phyir mthong ba'i phyis phyi ma 'dzin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa de ni spyi mthong ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The inference apprehends what is similar to what is seen, i.e., the universal.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: Granted that this is so,

original: 'dir me'i spyi tsam 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te 'on kyang /
analyzed: 'dir me'i spyi tsam 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te 'on kyang /
translated: but it is not just the universal of fire that is apprehended, but rather

original: so sor nges pa'i yul du gnas pa'i me'i khyad par spyi'i sgo nas shes pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i yul du gnas pa'i me'i khyad par spyi'i sgo nas shes pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: the particular of fire, which is located in a particular place, is known through the universal.

original: khyad par la brten pa 'di tsam gyis ni mi nyams pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par la brten pa 'di tsam gyis ni mi nyams pa ma yin no //
translated: But this is not the case, because the particular is not destroyed by this much, i.e., by the universal.

original: de ltar na aa ka ru'i du ba la sogs pas de skyed par byed pa'i mi shes pa na yang me'i spyi nyid @167a * //üîΩrtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar na aa ka ru'i du ba la sogs pas de skyed par byed pa'i mi shes pa na yang me'i spyi nyid @167a * // rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: Thus, when one does not know that fire is the producer of smoke, etc., one does understand the universal of fire,üîΩbut not the particular, the individual fire.

original: so sor nges pa khyad par can ni ma yin pa de ltar na gang de ni cir yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: so sor nges pa khyad par can ni ma yin pa de ltar na gang de ni cir yang mi rung ngo //
translated: And so, it is not suitable for that to be the example.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi gal te de nyid dpe yin pa /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi gal te de nyid dpe yin pa /
translated: But if that is the example,

original: de ltar spyi 'dzin ma yin na gang la dpe dang dpes bstan pa tha dad pa de la de dag ni spyir rjes su dpag par 'gyur la 'dis ni dpes bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid dpe yin te /
analyzed: de ltar spyi 'dzin ma yin na gang la dpe dang dpes bstan pa tha dad pa de la de dag ni spyir rjes su dpag par 'gyur la 'dis ni dpes bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid dpe yin te /
translated: if it is not the apprehension of a universal, then that which is different from the example and the exemplification would be inferred in a general way, and this would be the example of that which is exemplified by the example,

original: dper na de nyid 'di yin no zhes rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dper na de nyid 'di yin no zhes rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is taught that it is just that.

original: de'i phyir spyi'i sgo nas rjes su dpag ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi'i sgo nas rjes su dpag ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is not an inference in terms of a universal.

original: gal te de lta yin pa de'i tshe dpe ni grub pa yin par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin pa de'i tshe dpe ni grub pa yin par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If that is the case, then the example would be established,

original: ma grub pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: ma grub pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: but it is not established.

original: dpe nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di nyid kyis grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dpe nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di nyid kyis grub par 'gyur te /
translated: Because it is an example, it is established by this.

original: dpe nyid yin phyir rgyu yi phyir //
analyzed: dpe nyid yin phyir rgyu yi phyir //
translated: Because it is an example, it is a cause.

original: grub pa 'di la ste /
analyzed: grub pa 'di la ste /
translated: This is established.

original: sngar yongs su mthong ba la shes par byed pa'i tshad mas kyang ni ci zhig bya dgos pa cung zad yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sngar yongs su mthong ba la shes par byed pa'i tshad mas kyang ni ci zhig bya dgos pa cung zad yod pa ma yin te /
translated: What need is there for a valid cognition that causes the understanding of what was previously seen?

original: sgrub par byed pa ni ma rtogs pa shes par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni ma rtogs pa shes par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nothing at all, because the proof has the characteristic of causing the understanding of what was not previously understood.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is true, but

original: gal te rjod byed skyon med na //
analyzed: gal te rjod byed skyon med na //
translated: if the expression is faultless,

original: gal te yang des sngar de bzung zin pa de ltar na yang chod pas brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te yang des sngar de bzung zin pa de ltar na yang chod pas brjod pa yin la /
translated: even if it has previously apprehended that, it is expressed by the expression.

original: brjod pa nyid kyi phyir phyis kyang rtags kyi rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: brjod pa nyid kyi phyir phyis kyang rtags kyi rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Because it is expressed, it is understood by the evidence later.

original: gal te don de bzung ba brjed pa yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te don de bzung ba brjed pa yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If that object is forgotten,

original: de nyid phyir na brjed pa nyid kyi phyir ma grub pa ni rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin pa de ltar na dpe ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid phyir na brjed pa nyid kyi phyir ma grub pa ni rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin pa de ltar na dpe ma yin te /
translated: then because of that very forgetting, the unestablished is not a part of the understanding. In that case, it is not an example.

original: ma grub pa dper 'gyur ba rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma grub pa dper 'gyur ba rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not right for an unestablished example to be a proof.

original: rtogs pa'i yul can tshad mar 'gyur bar rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i yul can tshad mar 'gyur bar rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not right that a cognition that understands be a valid cognition,

original: khyad par mthong ba zhes bya ba ngo shes pa dran pa bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa'i yul can nyid du khas blangs pa yin pas /
analyzed: khyad par mthong ba zhes bya ba ngo shes pa dran pa bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa'i yul can nyid du khas blangs pa yin pas /
translated: because you have accepted that seeing a difference is a cognition that understands itself, in the sense of being a memory that recognizes.

original: dpe de nyid kyis de nyid rtogs par khas len pa'i phyir dang ma grub pa yang dpe nyid ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe de nyid kyis de nyid rtogs par khas len pa'i phyir dang ma grub pa yang dpe nyid ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because you accept that it is that very example that understands that very thing, and because an unestablished example is not an example.

original: de'i phyir khyad par mthong ba la tshad mar nus pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par mthong ba la tshad mar nus pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, seeing a difference is not a valid cognition.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /üîΩgal te mthong ba de dngos ni //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi / gal te mthong ba de dngos ni //
translated: This is the case, butüîΩif that seeing were established by valid cognition,

original: tshad mas grub na de ltar gyi don mthong ba 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i shes pa'i yul nyid yin pas na de'i dngos bo ste /
analyzed: tshad mas grub na de ltar gyi don mthong ba 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i shes pa'i yul nyid yin pas na de'i dngos bo ste /
translated: then it would be the object of the cognition that thinks, ‚ÄúI see that thing.‚Äù Therefore it is the thing itself.

original: sngar mthong ba'i don gyi dngos bo gang yin pa de kho bos sngar mthong ba de nyid da @167b ltar mthong ba de 'di yin no zhes da ltar mthong ba'i don la sngar mthong ba'i don gyi dngos po'i chos rtogs pa med par khyad par mthong ba zhes
analyzed: sngar mthong ba'i don gyi dngos bo gang yin pa de kho bos sngar mthong ba de nyid da @167b ltar mthong ba de 'di yin no zhes da ltar mthong ba'i don la sngar mthong ba'i don gyi dngos po'i chos rtogs pa med par khyad par mthong ba zhes
translated: The object of the previous seeing is the thing that was seen.  This is the very thing that I see now. Without realizing the object of the previous seeing as the thing that is the object of the present seeing, one sees a difference.

original: bya ba'i chad mas rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bya ba'i chad mas rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: This is called the realization of the qualifier.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: rnam pa gnyi ga la skyon yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyi ga la skyon yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both aspects are faulty.

original: re zhig gal te dus snga phyir mthong pa'i don tha dad pa yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: re zhig gal te dus snga phyir mthong pa'i don tha dad pa yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: First, if the object of the previous and later seeing are different,

original: dngos po gzhan la /
analyzed: dngos po gzhan la /
translated: then it is a different thing.

original: de nyid sgro 'dogs phyin log yin //üîΩdngos po gzhan nyid la gzhan du de nyid 'di yin no zhes /
analyzed: de nyid sgro 'dogs phyin log yin // dngos po gzhan nyid la gzhan du de nyid 'di yin no zhes /
translated: The superimposition of thatness is a mistake.

original: don de'i dngos po de nyid du sgro 'dogs pa ni phyin ci log yin gyi /
analyzed: don de'i dngos po de nyid du sgro 'dogs pa ni phyin ci log yin gyi /
translated: The superimposition of thatness of the thing that is the object of the previous seeing onto a different thing is a mistake.

original: tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not a valid cognition,

original: tha dad bar gyur pa dag la gcig nyid du zhen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad bar gyur pa dag la gcig nyid du zhen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the conception of oneness in the case of different things.

original: ci ste dus snga phyir mthong ba'i don de dag tha dad pa med pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: ci ste dus snga phyir mthong ba'i don de dag tha dad pa med pa de'i tshe /
translated: But if the object seen earlier and later is not different,

original: de grub phyir na tshad nyid yin //
analyzed: de grub phyir na tshad nyid yin //
translated: then it is established, and therefore it is valid cognition.

original: khyad par mthong ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par mthong ba'o //
translated: It is the perception of difference.

original: khyad par med pa'i don de ni gcig nyid yin la de yang sngar mthong ba de grub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i don de ni gcig nyid yin la de yang sngar mthong ba de grub pa'i phyir te /
translated: The object that is not different is one, and it is established by the previous perception,

original: mthong ba'i yul can gyi mthong ba dang dran pa'i 'du byed nyams pa med pa'i phyir de yul can gyi shes pa phyi ma tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba'i yul can gyi mthong ba dang dran pa'i 'du byed nyams pa med pa'i phyir de yul can gyi shes pa phyi ma tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: because the memory that is the subject of the perception and the memory that is the subject of the recollection are not impaired. Therefore the later cognition that is the subject of the object is not valid cognition.

original: sngar gyi mthong ba brjed na ni de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngar gyi mthong ba brjed na ni de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one forgets the previous perception, one cannot say ‚Äúthis is that.‚Äù

original: sngar mthong ba'i don gyi dngos po de'i chos ma rtogs pa phyis rtogs pa yin no zhes bshad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba'i don gyi dngos po de'i chos ma rtogs pa phyis rtogs pa yin no zhes bshad pa ma yin nam /
translated: But didn‚Äôt we explain that the object that was seen earlier is not realized to be the property of that object, but is realized later?

original: bshad pa ni bden te /
analyzed: bshad pa ni bden te /
translated: We did explain that.

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: But that is not reasonable.

original: gang gis na don gyi chos cung zad gang yin pa 'di ni de'i rang bzhin las phyi rol du gyur pa ni ma yin na /
analyzed: gang gis na don gyi chos cung zad gang yin pa 'di ni de'i rang bzhin las phyi rol du gyur pa ni ma yin na /
translated: If the object is not different from the object‚Äôs properties, then how could the object be external to its nature?

original: sngar med cing phyis 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: sngar med cing phyis 'byung ba yin /
translated: It is not something that existed before and then arises later.

original: gal te 'gyur na de nyid de dag gi rang bzhin gyi rten tha dad pa yin pa de ltar na tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'gyur na de nyid de dag gi rang bzhin gyi rten tha dad pa yin pa de ltar na tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it did, then that would be the basis of their intrinsic reality, and they would be different.

original: de'i yang skyon bshad zin to //
analyzed: de'i yang skyon bshad zin to //
translated: The error in that has already been explained.

original: de bas na skyes bu lta ba pos de nyid 'di yin no zhes de 'ba' zhig rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis gcig tu byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de bas na skyes bu lta ba pos de nyid 'di yin no zhes de 'ba' zhig rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis gcig tu byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the viewer, the person, makes them one by the mere conceptual thought, ‚ÄúThat is this,‚Äù

original: don gyi rang bzhin gyi khyad par ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don gyi rang bzhin gyi khyad par ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: but there is not the slightest difference in the intrinsic reality of the object.üîΩTherefore:

original: de'i phyir / mngon sum cig shos la gcig phyir //
analyzed: de'i phyir / mngon sum cig shos la gcig phyir //
translated: Because the other is one in the one,

original: gcig grub gnyi ga la yang yin //
analyzed: gcig grub gnyi ga la yang yin //
translated: when one is established, both are established.

original: sngar mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid mngon sum du 'dod pa khyad par med pa phyis 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: sngar mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid mngon sum du 'dod pa khyad par med pa phyis 'byung ba yin no //
translated: That which was seen before is asserted to be the other direct perception, which is not different.

original: de la gcig la grub pa na gzhan la grub pa nyid yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: de la gcig la grub pa na gzhan la grub pa nyid yin pa de ltar na /
translated: When one is established, the other is established.

original: de shes pa phyi ma ni tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de shes pa phyi ma ni tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
translated: In that case, the subsequent cognition is not a valid means of knowledge.

original: @168a * // 'on kyang zhen pa'ang ste /
analyzed: @168a * // 'on kyang zhen pa'ang ste /
translated: However, there is also attachment.üîΩ

original: nges pa mkhas pa rigs par shes pa dag gis shes /
analyzed: nges pa mkhas pa rigs par shes pa dag gis shes /
translated: But the wise, who know the truth, know that it is not so.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: gzhan dang mtshams ni sbyor ba yi //
analyzed: gzhan dang mtshams ni sbyor ba yi //
translated: It is the connection with another,

original: dus sngar 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can mthong ba dang ngo //üîΩde la mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i 'du byed la rmongs pa can gyi sngon mthong ba'i rnam pa 'dzin par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: dus sngar 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can mthong ba dang ngo // de la mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i 'du byed la rmongs pa can gyi sngon mthong ba'i rnam pa 'dzin par zhen pa'o //
translated: which is seen to occur at an earlier time.üîΩThe connection is the grasping of the form of what was seen by one who is confused about the compositional activity that is seen.

original: de'i khyad par mthong ba 'di la mthong ba nyid du 'dod pa yod pa yin no zhes shes pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i khyad par mthong ba 'di la mthong ba nyid du 'dod pa yod pa yin no zhes shes pa nyid yin te /
translated: The difference between the two is that the latter is the memory of what was seen, and the former is the desire to see what was seen.

original: khyad par yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The difference must be stated.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is true, but

original: gal te de rtags la ltos phyir //üîΩdran min gal te dran par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te de rtags la ltos phyir // dran min gal te dran par 'gyur na /
translated: if memory is dependent on a sign,üîΩit is not memory.

original: du ba la sogs pa'i nye bar mtshon pa la ltos pa ma yin la /
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa'i nye bar mtshon pa la ltos pa ma yin la /
translated: If memory were dependent on a sign, it would not be memory, because it would be dependent on a sign, like the memory of smoke, etc.

original: ltos pa yang de nyid 'di yin no zhes 'gyur ba de'i phyir dran pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ltos pa yang de nyid 'di yin no zhes 'gyur ba de'i phyir dran pa ma yin no //
translated: And it is not the case that it is dependent on that sign, because it is said that it is memory of that.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: tshad ma nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tshad ma nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: It is valid knowledge.

original: de ltar ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: 'khrul phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul phyir ro //
translated: because it is mistaken.

original: re zhig dran pa ni rgyu mtshan med par skye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig dran pa ni rgyu mtshan med par skye ba ma yin te /
translated: First, memory does not arise without a reason,

original: thams cad la dus thams cad du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad la dus thams cad du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it would occur at all times with respect to everything.

original: des na 'ga' zhig gi tshe de 'bad rtsol la sogs pa mthun pa yod na 'gyur zhing 'ga' zhig gi tshe phyi rol gyi rtags 'ga' zhig la ltos nas skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'ga' zhig gi tshe de 'bad rtsol la sogs pa mthun pa yod na 'gyur zhing 'ga' zhig gi tshe phyi rol gyi rtags 'ga' zhig la ltos nas skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, sometimes it arises through the power of effort and so on, and sometimes it arises in dependence on some external sign.

original: des na gal te de rtags la ltos phyir zhes bya ba 'dir tshul gsum pa'i rtags las 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gtan tshigs kyi don yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: des na gal te de rtags la ltos phyir zhes bya ba 'dir tshul gsum pa'i rtags las 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gtan tshigs kyi don yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: Therefore, if the meaning of the reason ‚Äúbecause it depends on a sign‚Äù is that it arises from a sign that possesses the three modes,

original: gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin te /
translated: then the reason is not established,

original: tshul gsum pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a sign that possesses the three modes does not exist.

original: ci ste rtags mthong ba gang yin pa 'ga' zhig las zhes bya ba yin pa de'i tshe yul la sogs pa mthong ba dang 'dris pa kun rdzob la sogs pas kyang ngo shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: ci ste rtags mthong ba gang yin pa 'ga' zhig las zhes bya ba yin pa de'i tshe yul la sogs pa mthong ba dang 'dris pa kun rdzob la sogs pas kyang ngo shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur na /
translated: But if it is the case that the seeing of the sign is from something, then at that time, the recognition would arise from the conventional, such as the seeing of the object and so on.

original: yul la sogs pa de ni de'i ma 'khrul ba'i rtags kyang ma yin no de ltar na 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: yul la sogs pa de ni de'i ma 'khrul ba'i rtags kyang ma yin no de ltar na 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: But that object and so on is not the sign of the non-mistaken one. Thus, it is mistaken.

original: gnas skabs snga phyi dag la yang tha dad pa med bar bstan pa nus ba ma yin na /
analyzed: gnas skabs snga phyi dag la yang tha dad pa med bar bstan pa nus ba ma yin na /
translated: If it is not possible to teach that the former and latter states are not different,

original: gang gis na de khyab par mthong ba yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis na de khyab par mthong ba yin par 'gyur /
translated: then how could it be that the pervasion is seen?

original: khyad par med pa yin na yang sngar gyi mngon sum gang yin pa de ni phyis kyang de nyid yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: khyad par med pa yin na yang sngar gyi mngon sum gang yin pa de ni phyis kyang de nyid yin pa de ltar na /
translated: If there is no difference, then whatever the former direct perception is, it is also that later on.

original: tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir lkog tu gyur pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir lkog tu gyur pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur na /
translated: In that case, because there is no difference, it would not be called ‚Äúhidden.‚Äù

original: rnam bar phye ba 'di yang yod pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam bar phye ba 'di yang yod pa yin no //
translated: But this distinction does exist.

original: de bas na khyad par kho na mthong ba ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: de bas na khyad par kho na mthong ba ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that only the difference is seen.

original: @168b don gcig du mar mthong ba srid pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: @168b don gcig du mar mthong ba srid pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to see a single object as multiple.

original: de bas na du mar zhes bya ba 'di yang 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na du mar zhes bya ba 'di yang 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this idea of multiplicity is also a mistake.

original: grangs la sogs pa la log par rtogs pa bzhi'i nang nas /
analyzed: grangs la sogs pa la log par rtogs pa bzhi'i nang nas /
translated: Among the four misconceptions about number, etc.,

original: grangs la log par rtogs pa bsal nas /
analyzed: grangs la log par rtogs pa bsal nas /
translated: having eliminated the misconception about number,

original: rang gi ngo bo la log par rtogs pa bsal bar bzhed pas /üîΩmngon sum rtog dang bral ba can //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo la log par rtogs pa bsal bar bzhed pas / mngon sum rtog dang bral ba can //
translated: in order to eliminate the misconception about intrinsic nature,üîΩhe says, ‚ÄúDirect perception is free from conceptual thought,‚Äù and so on.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te dbang po la brten pas na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te dbang po la brten pas na /
translated: Since it is based on the sense faculties,

original: mngon sum zhes bya ba 'dis ni mtshan nyid kyi gzhi bstan to //
analyzed: mngon sum zhes bya ba 'dis ni mtshan nyid kyi gzhi bstan to //
translated: it is called ‚Äúdirect perception.‚Äù This indicates the basis of the characteristic.

original: rtog dang bral ba can zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: rtog dang bral ba can zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúFree from conceptual thought‚Äù is the characteristic.

original: rtog pa las bral ba'am /
analyzed: rtog pa las bral ba'am /
translated: Either it is free from conceptual thought,

original: 'di la rtog pa dang bral ba can nam rtogs pas bral ba ni bral zhing spangs pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di la rtog pa dang bral ba can nam rtogs pas bral ba ni bral zhing spangs pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: or it is free from conceptual thought, free from conceptual thought. The phrase ‚Äúfree from conceptual thought‚Äù is to be connected with the word ‚Äúabandoned.‚Äù

original: slob dpon gyis 'dir rtog pa dang ma 'dres pa la mngon sum las 'thad pa cung zad kyang ma bshad de /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis 'dir rtog pa dang ma 'dres pa la mngon sum las 'thad pa cung zad kyang ma bshad de /
translated: The master has not explained the slightest bit of logical reasoning here for the non-mixing of thought and direct perception.üîΩThus, he says:

original: 'di ltar / mngon sum rtog dang bral ba can //
analyzed: 'di ltar / mngon sum rtog dang bral ba can //
translated: Direct perception, free from thought,

original: mngon sum nyid kyis grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: mngon sum nyid kyis grub par 'gyur /
translated: is established by direct perception itself.

original: 'di la rigs pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: 'di la rigs pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
translated: What need is there for another reasoning here?

original: ji ltar zhe na kun gyi rnam rtog ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na kun gyi rnam rtog ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: How is that? He says:

original: skyes bu kun gyi rnam rtog ni //
analyzed: skyes bu kun gyi rnam rtog ni //
translated: The thoughts of all people

original: so sor rang gis rig bya yin //
analyzed: so sor rang gis rig bya yin //
translated: are to be known individually by themselves.

original: rang rig pa'am shes pa gzhan gyis so //üîΩci 'dra ba zhig ce na ming rten can gang la ming la rten yod pa'am /
analyzed: rang rig pa'am shes pa gzhan gyis so // ci 'dra ba zhig ce na ming rten can gang la ming la rten yod pa'am /
translated: By self-awareness or another consciousness.

original: ming gi rten yin pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: ming gi rten yin pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: What kind of thoughts? Those that have a basis in names, where there is a basis in names, or that are the basis of names, the words are to be connected in this way.

original: rnam par rtog pa brjod pa dang 'drer rung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa brjod pa dang 'drer rung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: They are thoughts that are suitable to be mixed with expressions. This is the meaning.

original: des ni mthong ba las gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yod pa yang rtog pa med pa nyid yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: des ni mthong ba las gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yod pa yang rtog pa med pa nyid yin no zhes bshad do //
