original: khyed kyis kun du brtags par nye bar btags pa'i sa bon yod pa'i phyir me tog rgyas pa can gyi nags zhes nye bar btags pa las tha snyad spyor ba 'dod mod kyi /
analyzed: khyed kyis kun du brtags par nye bar btags pa'i sa bon yod pa'i phyir me tog rgyas pa can gyi nags zhes nye bar btags pa las tha snyad spyor ba 'dod mod kyi /
translated: you may accept the conventional usage of the designation ‚Äúflowering forest‚Äù because the seed of designation imputed by you exists.

original: 'di la de yod pa yang ma yin te /üîΩshing la sogs pa'i yan lag re re la yang yod pa ma yin na gang las 'brel pa de dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi khang bzangs la 'am /
analyzed: 'di la de yod pa yang ma yin te / shing la sogs pa'i yan lag re re la yang yod pa ma yin na gang las 'brel pa de dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi khang bzangs la 'am /
translated: But it does not exist here.

original: de'i rigs rang bzhin @180a * //
analyzed: de'i rigs rang bzhin @180a * //
translated: If it does not exist in each part, such as the trees, from what is the designation ‚Äúpalace‚Äù imputed, which possesses the parts that are connected to it?

original: can gyi phreng ba la chen po pa nyid la sogs pa'i tha snyad 'dogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: can gyi phreng ba la chen po pa nyid la sogs pa'i tha snyad 'dogs par 'gyur /
translated: Or from what is the designation ‚Äúgreat‚Äù imputed to the garland that possesses that nature?

original: de'i phyir phreng ba la chen po nyid la sogs pa'i tha snyad 'di dngos sam /
analyzed: de'i phyir phreng ba la chen po nyid la sogs pa'i tha snyad 'di dngos sam /
translated: Therefore, the conventions of largeness and so on are applied to the rosary.üîΩ

original: nye bar btags pa gzhan la 'thad pa ma yin no //üîΩkho bo cag ni /
analyzed: nye bar btags pa gzhan la 'thad pa ma yin no // kho bo cag ni /
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable that the convention of ‚Äúgreat‚Äù and so on is applied to the rosary either actually or figuratively.

original: 'di dngos nyid kyi nyer btags min //
analyzed: 'di dngos nyid kyi nyer btags min //
translated: We do not say that it is figuratively applied to that.

original: ci'i phyir nye bar btags pa ma yin zhe na /üîΩdngos kyi khyad par med shes pas //üîΩgzung bya nyid phyir ri bo la sogs pa'i chen po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos po gnag yin pa de'i yul can gyi shes pa 'khrul pa med pa 'jug pa gang yin pa de dang khyad par med pa can khang bzangs kyi phreng ba la 'khrul pa med
analyzed: ci'i phyir nye bar btags pa ma yin zhe na / dngos kyi khyad par med shes pas // gzung bya nyid phyir ri bo la sogs pa'i chen po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos po gnag yin pa de'i yul can gyi shes pa 'khrul pa med pa 'jug pa gang yin pa de dang khyad par med pa can khang bzangs kyi phreng ba la 'khrul pa med
translated: Why is it not figuratively applied?üîΩBecause the cognition apprehending it is nonerroneous.üîΩThe cognition that engages the object ‚Äúgreat‚Äù and so on without error is the cognition that engages the rosary without error.

original: par 'jug pa'i shes pa gang yin pa des gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: par 'jug pa'i shes pa gang yin pa des gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚Äúbecause it is apprehended by that‚Äù is that it is apprehended by the cognition that engages the object without error.

original: sbyor ba yang gang dang gang dngos kyi yul cang yi sgra dang shes pa khyad par med pa can dag gis gzung bar bya ba yin pa de ni dngos kyi don yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba yang gang dang gang dngos kyi yul cang yi sgra dang shes pa khyad par med pa can dag gis gzung bar bya ba yin pa de ni dngos kyi don yin te /
translated: The object of the word and the cognition is the same, and it is the object of the word and the cognition.

original: dper na ba lang gi gsal ba gcig gi yul can gyi sgra dang shes pa dag gis khyad par med par gzung bar bya ba /
analyzed: dper na ba lang gi gsal ba gcig gi yul can gyi sgra dang shes pa dag gis khyad par med par gzung bar bya ba /
translated: For example, the word and the cognition of a single cow apprehend the particular of the cow without distinction.

original: ba lang gi gsal ba'i khyad par gnyis pa yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ba lang gi gsal ba'i khyad par gnyis pa yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: The second particular of the cow is also like that.

original: khang bzangs kyi phreng ba chen po yang ri bo la sogs pa la gnas pa'i chen po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos kyi yul can gyi sgra dang / shes pa dag gis khyad par med pa'i shes pas gzung bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //üîΩgzhan yang tha dad pa'i khyad par can dngos po yin la /
analyzed: khang bzangs kyi phreng ba chen po yang ri bo la sogs pa la gnas pa'i chen po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos kyi yul can gyi sgra dang / shes pa dag gis khyad par med pa'i shes pas gzung bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so // gzhan yang tha dad pa'i khyad par can dngos po yin la /
translated: The great garland of palaces is also apprehended by the cognition that does not distinguish the word and the cognition whose object is the greatness, etc. that exist in the mountain, etc. This is a natural inference.üîΩMoreover, what is said to be different particulars is a real thing,

original: gzhan nye bar btags pa yin no zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan nye bar btags pa yin no zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: and what is said to be a different designation is not existent.

original: 'di ltar nye bar btags pa'i don dag la sgra la sogs pa 'jug pa gang yin pa 'di rgyu gzhan med pa nyid don gzhan du gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi khyad par dang bral ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar nye bar btags pa'i don dag la sgra la sogs pa 'jug pa gang yin pa 'di rgyu gzhan med pa nyid don gzhan du gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi khyad par dang bral ba nyid do //
translated: Thus, the application of words such as ‚Äúvase‚Äù to things that are mere imputations is due to the absence of any other cause, and it is due to the absence of any other reason for the distinction.

original: de ni dngos su mngon par 'dod pa'i don la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de ni dngos su mngon par 'dod pa'i don la yang mtshungs so //
translated: This is the same even in the case of the object that is actually intended.

original: de skad du dbyug pa la sogs pa'i sgra la yang rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul du dbyug pa la sogs pa don dam par yod pa kho na nyid ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de skad du dbyug pa la sogs pa'i sgra la yang rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul du dbyug pa la sogs pa don dam par yod pa kho na nyid ma yin mod kyi /
translated: In the same way, even though a stick, etc., is not the ultimate existence that is the object of a conceptual consciousness,

original: khyad par nyid du smos pa yin no zhes sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: khyad par nyid du smos pa yin no zhes sngar bshad zin to //
translated: it is still said to be a distinction. This has already been explained.

original: gzhan yang drug rnams la ni rdzas la sogs pa'i tshig gi don rnams la tshig gi don zhes bya ba'i sgra dang shes pa gang yin pa 'di yang 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang drug rnams la ni rdzas la sogs pa'i tshig gi don rnams la tshig gi don zhes bya ba'i sgra dang shes pa gang yin pa 'di yang 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, in the case of the six, the words and consciousnesses that are called ‚Äúword-meaning‚Äù in regard to the meanings of words such as ‚Äúsubstance‚Äù are also applied.

original: de 'jug par 'gyur ba na tshig gi don las gzhan du gyur pa'i khyad par @180b gyi ngo bo rgyu gzhan gang la ltos par 'gyur ba de ltar na ltos par 'gyur ba cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de nyid ma nges pa
analyzed: de 'jug par 'gyur ba na tshig gi don las gzhan du gyur pa'i khyad par @180b gyi ngo bo rgyu gzhan gang la ltos par 'gyur ba de ltar na ltos par 'gyur ba cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de nyid ma nges pa
translated: In this way, it is not at all reliant.

original: nyid kyi gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
analyzed: nyid kyi gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
translated: This is what he establishes as the definitive meaning.

original: khyed dag gi dngos dang nye bar btags pa'i mtshan nyid 'jig rten la rab tu grags pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: khyed dag gi dngos dang nye bar btags pa'i mtshan nyid 'jig rten la rab tu grags pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: You do not assert the characteristics of real things and imputations that are well known in the world.

original: 'on kyang khyod nyid kyis dngos po gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de ni dngos yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang khyod nyid kyis dngos po gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de ni dngos yin la /
translated: However, you yourself impute that whatever is the reason for being a different thing is a real thing,

original: gzhan ni nye bar btags pa yin no zhes de rang nyid kyis nye bar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni nye bar btags pa yin no zhes de rang nyid kyis nye bar btags pa yin no //
translated: and whatever is different from that is an imputation.

original: de ltar na /üîΩji ltar rnam pa gang gis 'grub //
analyzed: de ltar na / ji ltar rnam pa gang gis 'grub //
translated: In that case,üîΩhow is it established?

original: gang las yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang las yin zhe na /
translated: In what way?

original: grags pa las te /
analyzed: grags pa las te /
translated: It is from what is well known.

original: dang por brda'i rjes su 'brangs nas de'i ngo bor zhen nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dang por brda'i rjes su 'brangs nas de'i ngo bor zhen nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that first one follows a convention and then conceives its nature.

original: don gyi bdag nyid gang yin pa de 'dra ba de ni dngos su 'jig rten la grags pa yin no //üîΩde dang mtshungs pa'i phyir grags pas rab tu grub pa dang chos mthun pa nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gyi bdag nyid gang yin pa de 'dra ba de ni dngos su 'jig rten la grags pa yin no // de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir grags pas rab tu grub pa dang chos mthun pa nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of the self is well known in the world as it is.üîΩIt is well known in the world as it is, because it is similar to that and because it is similar to the self that is well known in the world.üîΩThe meaning of the self is well known in the world as it is, because it is similar to that and because it is similar to the self that is well known in the world.

original: gang la de skad brjod dngos kyi don bzhin du bstan pa de phal pa yin no //
analyzed: gang la de skad brjod dngos kyi don bzhin du bstan pa de phal pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of the self is well known in the world as it is, because it is similar to that and because it is similar to the self that is well known in the world.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dngos la'ang dngos med 'dogs phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos la'ang dngos med 'dogs phyir ro //
translated: Because non-entity is imputed to entity.

original: de skad du 'ga' zhig gi tshe dngos po la yang skabs 'ga' zhig tu med pa bzhin du tha snyad 'jug par 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de skad du 'ga' zhig gi tshe dngos po la yang skabs 'ga' zhig tu med pa bzhin du tha snyad 'jug par 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: Sometimes, in some contexts, the term non-entity is used for entity.

original: de ni de la dngos ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de la dngos ma yin te /
translated: But that is not an entity.

original: med pa nyid la med pa'i tha snyad ni dngos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa nyid la med pa'i tha snyad ni dngos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the term non-entity is used for non-entity itself.

original: khyed cag gi gzhung gis kyang dngos po la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir don dngos yin par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: khyed cag gi gzhung gis kyang dngos po la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir don dngos yin par 'gyur gyi /
translated: According to your scriptures, because it engages with entity, it would be an object of entity.

original: med pa la ma yin pa de ltar na dngos dang nye bar btags pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa la ma yin pa de ltar na dngos dang nye bar btags pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: The characteristics of the real and the nominal are erroneous.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is so, but

original: grags pa nyid dngos po yin te /
analyzed: grags pa nyid dngos po yin te /
translated: what is well known is real.

original: 'on kyang grags pa de nyid khyad par don gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang grags pa de nyid khyad par don gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But that which is well known is not without a difference that is another object.

original: de yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That also does not exist.

original: 'di ltar de yang /üîΩgrags pa brda yi rjes 'gro can //
analyzed: 'di ltar de yang / grags pa brda yi rjes 'gro can //
translated: It is like this:üîΩThat which is well known follows linguistic signs.

original: brda'i ji lta ba bzhin du grags pa'o //üîΩbrda de yang brjod 'dod rjes 'gro can //
analyzed: brda'i ji lta ba bzhin du grags pa'o // brda de yang brjod 'dod rjes 'gro can //
translated: It is well known according to linguistic signs.üîΩAnd those linguistic signs follow the desire to express.

original: de'i 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: de'i 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: They have the nature of following the desire to express.

original: gal te don gyi rgyu mtshan ma yin na //
analyzed: gal te don gyi rgyu mtshan ma yin na //
translated: If they are not the causes of the object,

original: brda byed pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: brda byed pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: what is the use of linguistic signs?

original: tha snyad don du byas pa yin /
analyzed: tha snyad don du byas pa yin /
translated: They are made for the sake of conventional expressions.

original: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
analyzed: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
translated: What are they like?

original: sdeb sbyor ming dang sgra'i cha bzhin sdeb sbyor gyi ming bzhin te /
analyzed: sdeb sbyor ming dang sgra'i cha bzhin sdeb sbyor gyi ming bzhin te /
translated: They are like the parts of names and words in a metrical foot, like the names in a metrical foot.

original: dper na khyad par can gyi go rims bstan pa can gyi yi ge rnams la don gzhan du gyur pa med par me tog gi phreng ba 'chang ba can zhes bya ba sogs pa'i ming byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na khyad par can gyi go rims bstan pa can gyi yi ge rnams la don gzhan du gyur pa med par me tog gi phreng ba 'chang ba can zhes bya ba sogs pa'i ming byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the letters that are taught in the order of the special ones, without becoming a different object, make the name ‚Äúone who wears a garland of flowers,‚Äù and so on.

original: sgra'i cha'i ming bzhin te /
analyzed: sgra'i cha'i ming bzhin te /
translated: Like the name of a part of a word.

original: @181a * // dper na sgra'i yan lag la rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi tha dad byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: @181a * // dper na sgra'i yan lag la rang bzhin dang rkyen gyi tha dad byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the parts of a word are distinguished by nature and condition.

original: de la yang de la phan pa dang de la byed pa dang ldan pa'i rkyen dang / byas pa'i rkyen zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa ji ltar de ltar tha dad pa'i khyad par med na yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la yang de la phan pa dang de la byed pa dang ldan pa'i rkyen dang / byas pa'i rkyen zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa ji ltar de ltar tha dad pa'i khyad par med na yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: There, the condition of benefitting that and the condition of possessing activity are called the condition of being done, and so on. In that way, even though there is no distinction of a different attribute, it is the meaning of ‚Äújust as.‚Äù

original: gal te spyi med na ji ltar rjes su 'gro ba can gyi rkyen yin zhes bya ba'i 'dod pa yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te spyi med na ji ltar rjes su 'gro ba can gyi rkyen yin zhes bya ba'i 'dod pa yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: If there is no universal, how could there be the desire that it is a condition that is concomitant?

original: 'di ltar de ni tha dad na yang dngos chos kyis /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni tha dad na yang dngos chos kyis /
translated: In this way, even though it is different, it is a real entity.

original: don 'ga' zhig de 'dra ba rnam shes kyi rgyu yin rjes su 'gro ba can gyi shes pa'i rgyu mtshan yin gyi don gzhan rgyu mtshan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don 'ga' zhig de 'dra ba rnam shes kyi rgyu yin rjes su 'gro ba can gyi shes pa'i rgyu mtshan yin gyi don gzhan rgyu mtshan ni ma yin no //
translated: In some cases, the reason for consciousness is the cause of consciousness that is concomitant with that. But in other cases, the reason is not the cause.

original: gang la dngos po gang dag la shes pa de don tha dad na yang de la de ltar gcig nyid du des rtogs par 'gyur zhes rgyas par sngar bstan zin to //
analyzed: gang la dngos po gang dag la shes pa de don tha dad na yang de la de ltar gcig nyid du des rtogs par 'gyur zhes rgyas par sngar bstan zin to //
translated: If the object of a consciousness is different from that consciousness, then it is as we have extensively explained above: that consciousness will not cognize it.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is true.

original: ji ltar dngos po tha dad pa de dag de ltar de'i yul can gyi shes pa yin na yang dbang po'i shes pa tha dad pa yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po tha dad pa de dag de ltar de'i yul can gyi shes pa yin na yang dbang po'i shes pa tha dad pa yin pa de ltar na /
translated: But even though those different things are the objects of a consciousness, the sense consciousnesses are different.

original: ji ltar 'bras bu shes pa tha dad pa med pa de dag byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'bras bu shes pa tha dad pa med pa de dag byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that they are the causes of a single effect, a consciousness, which is not different?

original: de de ltar na ma yin te /
analyzed: de de ltar na ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: 'di ltar mthong ba'i ngo bo'i shes pa rnams don bzhin du tha dad pa yin pa de ltar na yang tha dad med rtogs phyir gcig tu rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan du'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mthong ba'i ngo bo'i shes pa rnams don bzhin du tha dad pa yin pa de ltar na yang tha dad med rtogs phyir gcig tu rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan du'o //
translated: Even though the consciousnesses that see different things are different, like the objects, they are the reason that they are cognized as the same, because they are the same in being consciousness.

original: gcig rtogs pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan te /
analyzed: gcig rtogs pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan te /
translated: The reason for the cognition of one thing is

original: don de dag gis rang gi yul la shes pa skyed par byed ces bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
analyzed: don de dag gis rang gi yul la shes pa skyed par byed ces bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
translated: that these objects generate a cognition of their own object.

original: de lta bu'i rnam pa'i don gyi yul can gyi dbang po'i shes pa de dag ni dngos po'i chos nyid kyis gcig tu rtogs pa'i shes pa de lta bu'i ngo bo'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa'i don gyi yul can gyi dbang po'i shes pa de dag ni dngos po'i chos nyid kyis gcig tu rtogs pa'i shes pa de lta bu'i ngo bo'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The sense consciousnesses that have as their object the meaning of such an aspect are, by the nature of things, the reason for the cognition of one thing, that is, they are the cause of a consciousness that cognizes one thing.

original: de yang shes pa tha dad pa med pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de yang shes pa tha dad pa med pa zhes bshad do //
translated: This is what is meant by ‚Äúwithout a separate consciousness.‚Äù

original: de yang sngar gcig bu rtogs pa'i blo'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir gsal ba rnams dang de'i 'bras bu rnams mthong ba la sogs pa yang tha dad pa med pa de ltar na dngos po 'bras bu gcig pa can yin no zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: de yang sngar gcig bu rtogs pa'i blo'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir gsal ba rnams dang de'i 'bras bu rnams mthong ba la sogs pa yang tha dad pa med pa de ltar na dngos po 'bras bu gcig pa can yin no zhes bstan zin to //
translated: Moreover, because it is the cause of the cognition of a single thing, the manifestation of the result, such as seeing, is also without a separate consciousness. Thus it has been shown that things have a single result.

original: de ltar te /
analyzed: de ltar te /
translated: In this way,

original: rnam pa 'dis de 'bras bu can min bral /
analyzed: rnam pa 'dis de 'bras bu can min bral /
translated: it is not the cause of a result, nor is it disjoined from it.

original: dngos rnams rjes 'gro yod min gyi //
analyzed: dngos rnams rjes 'gro yod min gyi //
translated: Things do not follow after it.

original: dngos gcig la min dngos po rnams la de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa rnam par bcad pa tsam ma gtogs par dngos bo gcig ste /
analyzed: dngos gcig la min dngos po rnams la de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa rnam par bcad pa tsam ma gtogs par dngos bo gcig ste /
translated: The meaning is that, apart from the mere exclusion of the non-existence of the effect in things, there is no single entity,

original: spyi dngos por gyur pa rjes su 'jug pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spyi dngos por gyur pa rjes su 'jug pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that is, no universal that is an entity, that is present in all things.

original: gang gi phyir dngos po rnams la de'i 'bras bu med pa can rnam par bcad pa yod pa dang / de'i @181b 'bras bu med pa can tha dad par bstan pa'i phyir sgra sbyor ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po rnams la de'i 'bras bu med pa can rnam par bcad pa yod pa dang / de'i @181b 'bras bu med pa can tha dad par bstan pa'i phyir sgra sbyor ba de'i phyir /
translated: Because the exclusion of the non-existence of the effect in things exists, and in order to demonstrate the difference between the non-existence of the effect and the absence of the effect, the term is applied in that way.üîΩTherefore, the statement

original: dngos la mnyan pa de mtha' can //
analyzed: dngos la mnyan pa de mtha' can //
translated: is limited to the entity.

original: rnam par gcod pa'i mtha' can yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i mtha' can yin no //
translated: It is limited to the exclusion.

original: de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang bral ba can ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang bral ba can ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
translated: The absence of the effect and the absence of the non-effect are merely examples.

original: 'di ltar gang las ldog pa gang yin pa de ldog pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir mnyan pa 'god pa yin par rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang las ldog pa gang yin pa de ldog pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir mnyan pa 'god pa yin par rtogs par bya ste /
translated: Thus, because the exclusion of one thing is taught to be the exclusion of another, the statement should be understood to be the positing of the exclusion.

original: dbyug pa can bzhin no //
analyzed: dbyug pa can bzhin no //
translated: It is like the word ‚Äúclub-man.‚Äù

original: gal te dngos la ldog pa'i mtha' can sgra yin pa de'i tshe dngos po nyid sgra'i don yin te /
analyzed: gal te dngos la ldog pa'i mtha' can sgra yin pa de'i tshe dngos po nyid sgra'i don yin te /
translated: If sound is the end of the thing, then the thing itself is the meaning of the word,

original: de ldog pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ldog pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the very nature of the thing to be excluded.

original: sgra'i dngos po la reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba yang lan mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: sgra'i dngos po la reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba yang lan mang du bshad zin to //
translated: And it has been explained many times that sound does not touch the thing.

original: de'i ldog pa'i bdag nyid sgra yod med gnyi ga la brten pa /
analyzed: de'i ldog pa'i bdag nyid sgra yod med gnyi ga la brten pa /
translated: The nature of sound, which is the exclusion of that, is based on both the existent and the nonexistent.

original: sgra don chos ni rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: sgra don chos ni rnam pa gsum //
translated: The property that is the meaning of the word is of three kinds.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de dang 'di 'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de dang 'di 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: You might think that this contradicts the earlier statement that the object of conceptual cognition is a representation.

original: skyon de yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skyon de yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no such fault.

original: 'di ltar / phyi rol nus pa rnams gcod la //
analyzed: 'di ltar / phyi rol nus pa rnams gcod la //
translated: Because it excludes external things that are capable of producing effects,

original: reg pa med na yang phyi rol gyi dngos po de las gzhan pa'i ldog pa rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa la reg pa med na yang ngo //
analyzed: reg pa med na yang phyi rol gyi dngos po de las gzhan pa'i ldog pa rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa la reg pa med na yang ngo //
translated: even though sound does not touch the external thing, it touches the exclusion that is different from that thing, which is of the nature of sound itself.

original: de sgra ni dngos po rnam par gcod pa brjod pa'i ngang tshul can gyi mnyan pa /
analyzed: de sgra ni dngos po rnam par gcod pa brjod pa'i ngang tshul can gyi mnyan pa /
translated: Sound is the listener that has the character of expressing the exclusion of the thing.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan dag 'brel pa yin te yang dag par sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan dag 'brel pa yin te yang dag par sbyor ba yin no //
translated: The conceptual images are related to the thing, they are applied to the thing.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of thing?

original: de mtha' can la ste /
analyzed: de mtha' can la ste /
translated: To the thing that has an end.

original: dngos po ldog pa'i mtha' can la'o //
analyzed: dngos po ldog pa'i mtha' can la'o //
translated: To the thing that has an end in the form of an exclusion of the contrary.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid dang rnam par brtag par bya ba'i yul la gcig tu 'khrul pas dngos po'i ldog pa la brten pa can de dag rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid dang rnam par brtag par bya ba'i yul la gcig tu 'khrul pas dngos po'i ldog pa la brten pa can de dag rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since they are mistaken as to the object which is the particular and the object of conceptual construction, they are based on the exclusion of the thing.

original: des na rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan dngos po ldog pa /
analyzed: des na rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan dngos po ldog pa /
translated: Therefore, the conceptual images are the exclusion of the thing,

original: gzhan sel mtha' can phyir /
analyzed: gzhan sel mtha' can phyir /
translated: because they have an end in the form of the exclusion of the other.

original: rgyu'i phyir mnyan pa gzhan sel byed par brjod /
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir mnyan pa gzhan sel byed par brjod /
translated: Because of the cause, the word is said to effect the exclusion of the other.

original: don phan tshun ldog pa can dag la nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas 'ongs pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: don phan tshun ldog pa can dag la nyams su myong ba'i sgo nas 'ongs pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because they come about by way of experience of the objects that have an end in the form of mutual exclusion.

original: rang gi cha la dmigs pa can sgra las byung ba'i rtogs par 'gyur na yang ngo bo nyid kyis 'khrul pas phyi rol gyi don phan tshun ldog pa can 'dzin pa can bzhin du snang ngo //
analyzed: rang gi cha la dmigs pa can sgra las byung ba'i rtogs par 'gyur na yang ngo bo nyid kyis 'khrul pas phyi rol gyi don phan tshun ldog pa can 'dzin pa can bzhin du snang ngo //
translated: Even though the understanding that arises from the word has as its object its own part, it is mistaken by nature, and so appears as if it were a grasper of external objects that have an end in the form of mutual exclusion.

original: blos snang ba dang rnam par brtag par bya ba'i den dag la tha dad pa med par zhen pas de las gzhan las ldog pa can gyi dngos po de dag la 'jug par byed pa'i @182a * //
analyzed: blos snang ba dang rnam par brtag par bya ba'i den dag la tha dad pa med par zhen pas de las gzhan las ldog pa can gyi dngos po de dag la 'jug par byed pa'i @182a * //
translated: Because of the adherence to the non-difference of the real entities that are the appearances and the conceptualized objects of the intellect, one engages in the entities that are the opposites of those other than that.

original: phyir dngos po'i ldog pa ston par byed pa la mnyan pa zhes brjod kyi /
analyzed: phyir dngos po'i ldog pa ston par byed pa la mnyan pa zhes brjod kyi /
translated: Therefore, the teaching of the exclusions of entities is called ‚Äúhearing.‚Äù

original: dngos po la reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po la reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one does not touch the entities.

original: de ltar na sgra dag las skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa la ldog pa bzhin du don gyi gzugs brnyan snang /
analyzed: de ltar na sgra dag las skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa la ldog pa bzhin du don gyi gzugs brnyan snang /
translated: Thus, in the conceptual cognition that arises from words, the reflection of the object appears as if it were an exclusion,

original: phyi rol gyi don bzhin du don gzhan ldog pa can mtshon par byed do //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don bzhin du don gzhan ldog pa can mtshon par byed do //
translated: and the object that is the opposite of other objects is indicated as if it were an external object.

original: gang de yang don gyi bdag nyid min /
analyzed: gang de yang don gyi bdag nyid min /
translated: Moreover, that is not the nature of the object.

original: don gyi bya ba byed pa'i ngang tshul can gyi dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: don gyi bya ba byed pa'i ngang tshul can gyi dngos po ma yin no //
translated: It is not an entity that has the character of performing the function of the object.

original: don dam par de gzhan las ldog pa yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: don dam par de gzhan las ldog pa yang ma yin gyi /
translated: In reality, it is not an exclusion of other.

original: 'on kyang de 'khrul bag chags rang bzhin can /
analyzed: 'on kyang de 'khrul bag chags rang bzhin can /
translated: However, it is a mistaken nature that has the habit ofüîΩ.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul nyams su myong pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu can yin gyi de sgra'i brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul nyams su myong pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu can yin gyi de sgra'i brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the cause of the latent potentialities of the experience of objects that are characterized by their own characteristics, but it is not the object of verbal expression.

original: de ltar na yang don gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa don mthong pa'i sgo nas 'ongs pa nyid kyi phyir don gyi cha'i rjes su 'brang ba can /
analyzed: de ltar na yang don gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa don mthong pa'i sgo nas 'ongs pa nyid kyi phyir don gyi cha'i rjes su 'brang ba can /
translated: Even so, because the aspect of the object is apprehended through the door of seeing the object, it is said to be ‚Äúconcomitant with the aspect of the object.‚Äù

original: de ni mnyan par brjod pa na //
analyzed: de ni mnyan par brjod pa na //
translated: When it is said that it is heard,

original: rnam par 'jog par byed na don gyi ba ba byed pa'i ngang tshul can gyi cha gang rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par 'jog par byed na don gyi ba ba byed pa'i ngang tshul can gyi cha gang rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: what part of it, which has the nature of apprehending the object, is understood?

original: cung zad kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: cung zad kyang ma yin no //
translated: None at all.

original: gang gi tshe de las gzhan pa las ldog pa mi 'dod pa spong pa'i sgo nas tha snyad 'dogs pa na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de las gzhan pa las ldog pa mi 'dod pa spong pa'i sgo nas tha snyad 'dogs pa na /
translated: When it is said that it is the exclusion of that which is other than it,

original: tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa pos sgra nyid las rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa pos sgra nyid las rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: the one who makes the convention does not understand it from the word itself.

original: dngos po'i ldog pa de sgra las ma rtogs par 'gyur na yang brda byed pa de ni don med par 'gyur /
analyzed: dngos po'i ldog pa de sgra las ma rtogs par 'gyur na yang brda byed pa de ni don med par 'gyur /
translated: Even if the exclusion of the thing is not understood from the word, the one who makes the convention is pointless.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar de de don can /
analyzed: 'di ltar de de don can /
translated: In this way, it has that meaning.

original: dngos po'i de las gzhan pa las rnam par gcod pas dngos po ston par byed pa'i 'bras bu can yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i de las gzhan pa las rnam par gcod pas dngos po ston par byed pa'i 'bras bu can yin no //
translated: It is the result of revealing a thing by excluding it from what is other than that thing.

original: 'dir sgra don cha ni brjod ces 'dri ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir sgra don cha ni brjod ces 'dri ba'o //
translated: Here, it is asked: ‚ÄúIs the part of the meaning of a word expressed?‚Äù

original: de las gzhan sel /
analyzed: de las gzhan sel /
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúThe exclusion of what is other than that is expressed.‚Äù

original: dngos po phan tshun ldog pa brjod par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: dngos po phan tshun ldog pa brjod par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: It is said that the mutual exclusion of things is what is to be expressed,

original: des ni dngos po dag la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des ni dngos po dag la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is what is absent in things.

original: de'i bsgrub par bya ba'i sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i dngos po las ldog pa'i sgo nas 'jug par bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i bsgrub par bya ba'i sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i dngos po las ldog pa'i sgo nas 'jug par bya ba la /
translated: In order to establish that, it is said that the exclusion of a thing that is not the means of establishing it should be engaged by way of the exclusion of that thing.

original: de gdon mi za bar brjod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gdon mi za bar brjod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it must be expressed.

original: rnam pa de yang rnam par rtog pa'i yul mthong ba goms pa las 'ongs pa rnam par rtog pa gsal ba snang ba yin gyi don la med /
analyzed: rnam pa de yang rnam par rtog pa'i yul mthong ba goms pa las 'ongs pa rnam par rtog pa gsal ba snang ba yin gyi don la med /
translated: Moreover, that aspect is the appearance of a clear concept that comes from being accustomed to seeing the object of a concept. It does not exist in the object.

original: don gyi bya ba byed pa'i ngang tshul can la yod pa ma yin na de bas na de ji ltar sgra'i don yin /
analyzed: don gyi bya ba byed pa'i ngang tshul can la yod pa ma yin na de bas na de ji ltar sgra'i don yin /
translated: If it does not exist in the object that has the mode of being that performs the function of the object, then how can it be the meaning of a word?

original: don gyi gzugs brnyan de brjod de sgra ji ltar don rten yin pa ltar na @182b phyi rol gyi don des don dang ldan par 'gyur bar rigs /
analyzed: don gyi gzugs brnyan de brjod de sgra ji ltar don rten yin pa ltar na @182b phyi rol gyi don des don dang ldan par 'gyur bar rigs /
translated: If the meaning-reflection is expressed, then just as the sound is the basis of the meaning, it is reasonable that the external object is endowed with the meaning.

original: de ltar na ba lang zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i rjes 'gro can sgra'i rjes 'gro can don gyis 'ga' zhig brjod par bya bas 'bras bu yin /
analyzed: de ltar na ba lang zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i rjes 'gro can sgra'i rjes 'gro can don gyis 'ga' zhig brjod par bya bas 'bras bu yin /
translated: In that case, the sound ‚Äúcow‚Äù and so on, which is the basis of the meaning, is the effect of the sound that is the basis of the meaning.

original: sgra'i don yod pa nyid du khas len pa na'o //
analyzed: sgra'i don yod pa nyid du khas len pa na'o //
translated: This is when one accepts that the meaning of the sound exists.

original: don gyi gzugs brnyan de yang rjes 'gro men pa can rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gyi gzugs brnyan de yang rjes 'gro men pa can rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, that meaning-reflection is not the basis of the meaning.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: blo las tha dad med phyir ro //
analyzed: blo las tha dad med phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not different from the mind.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i blo gang la don gyi rnam par snang ba'i blo de las shes pa bzhin tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i blo gang la don gyi rnam par snang ba'i blo de las shes pa bzhin tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The mind that is the conception is not different from the mind that appears as the form of the object, just like the consciousness.

original: de bas na don gyi gzugs brnyan de rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na don gyi gzugs brnyan de rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that meaning-reflection is not the basis of the meaning.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: mthong ba goms pas sprul ba ste rang gi mtshan nyid mthong ba'i bag chags kyis bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba goms pas sprul ba ste rang gi mtshan nyid mthong ba'i bag chags kyis bskyed pa'o //
translated: The emanation is the appearance of the object, generated by the instinct of seeing the intrinsic identity.

original: don gyi rnam bar 'dzin pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas spyi'i ngo bo med ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: don gyi rnam bar 'dzin pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas spyi'i ngo bo med ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The apprehension of the object-form is not the content of verbalization, because it is not a universal, since it is not repeatable.

original: sgra'i brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgra'i brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not the content of verbalization.

original: de'i ngo bo sgro 'dogs rtogs //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo sgro 'dogs rtogs //
translated: The form of that is the conceptual superimposition.

original: gzhan las ldog pa thob phyir yang //
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa thob phyir yang //
translated: Also, because of the attainment of the exclusion from other.

original: gal te yang don gyi gzugs brnyan de don gyi bya ba byed pa bzhin te /
analyzed: gal te yang don gyi gzugs brnyan de don gyi bya ba byed pa bzhin te /
translated: If the reflection of the object acts like the object,

original: de las gzhan pa'i dngos po las ldog pa bzhin du snang ba de las rang gi mtshan nyid du sgro btags pa las rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i dngos po las ldog pa bzhin du snang ba de las rang gi mtshan nyid du sgro btags pa las rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: it appears as the exclusion of other things, and because of the conceptualization of the intrinsic identity,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid du zhen pas rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i ngang tshul can gyi gzugs brnyan rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid du zhen pas rnam par rtog pa la snang ba'i ngang tshul can gyi gzugs brnyan rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the conceptualization of the reflection, which has the mode of appearance of the conceptualization of the intrinsic identity, is attained.

original: de'i tshe rang gi mtshan nyid dang de la gcig du 'khrul ba sgro btags pas rtogs pas dngos po gzhan las ldog pa'i dngos po thob pa'i rgyu'i phyir tha dad pa med par zhen pa sgro 'dogs de nyid sgra'i don shes pa la snang ba'i ngang tshul can
analyzed: de'i tshe rang gi mtshan nyid dang de la gcig du 'khrul ba sgro btags pas rtogs pas dngos po gzhan las ldog pa'i dngos po thob pa'i rgyu'i phyir tha dad pa med par zhen pa sgro 'dogs de nyid sgra'i don shes pa la snang ba'i ngang tshul can
translated: At that time, the superimposition of error with respect to the intrinsic identity and its oneness is understood. Therefore, the superimposition of nondifference is imputed in order to obtain the entity that is the opposite of other entities.

original: zhes nye bar 'dogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes nye bar 'dogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, it is said that the mode of appearance of the object of the word is imputed.

original: de skad du brjod pa la ni 'gal ba cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: de skad du brjod pa la ni 'gal ba cung zad kyang med do //
translated: In this way, there is not the slightest contradiction in making such statements.

original: de ltar na tha snyad kyi dus su mi 'dod pa'i don spangs nas /
analyzed: de ltar na tha snyad kyi dus su mi 'dod pa'i don spangs nas /
translated: Thus, having abandoned the unwanted object at the time of convention,

original: dngos po 'dod pa nyid la skyes bu dag gis 'jug par byed pa na /
analyzed: dngos po 'dod pa nyid la skyes bu dag gis 'jug par byed pa na /
translated: when persons engage in the mere assertion of entity,

original: don gyi cha la 'di rjes 'gro //
analyzed: don gyi cha la 'di rjes 'gro //
translated: the aspect of the object is followed.

original: dngos po dag las de las gzhan pa rnam par bcad nas rjes su 'gro bar byed do //
analyzed: dngos po dag las de las gzhan pa rnam par bcad nas rjes su 'gro bar byed do //
translated: From among entities, it follows by the exclusion of that which is other than that.

original: de bas na tha snyad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i cha 'di tsam gyis de ltar sgra'i don du rtogs pa rigs pa yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de bas na tha snyad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i cha 'di tsam gyis de ltar sgra'i don du rtogs pa rigs pa yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is reasonable to understand the object of the word in that way by means of the mere aspect that follows after convention.

original: don dam par dpyad na //
analyzed: don dam par dpyad na //
translated: When analyzed in terms of the ultimate,

original: de dag log par snang ba nyid de dag brdzun pa'i don du snang ba'i ngang tshul can yin no //
analyzed: de dag log par snang ba nyid de dag brdzun pa'i don du snang ba'i ngang tshul can yin no //
translated: they are false appearances, having the mode of appearance of being false.

original: shes pa'i sgra @183a * //
analyzed: shes pa'i sgra @183a * //
translated: The word ‚Äúconsciousness‚Äù

original: yis des sprul ba sgra las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: yis des sprul ba sgra las skyes pa'o //
translated: is produced from the sound of that.

original: de dag gi don 'ga' zhig kyang yod ba ma yin bde ltar na /
analyzed: de dag gi don 'ga' zhig kyang yod ba ma yin bde ltar na /
translated: Since they do not have any object,

original: sgras cung zhig kyang shes par byed ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sgras cung zhig kyang shes par byed ba ma yin no //
translated: sound does not cause the understanding of anything.

original: tha snyang ni 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: tha snyang ni 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: Convention is mistaken.

original: de dag don dang 'brel pa yang rag las pa las yin no zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: de dag don dang 'brel pa yang rag las pa las yin no zhes bstan zin to //
translated: It has been explained that their connection with objects is dependent.

original: gang gi phyir tha snyad 'dogs pa po tha snyad kyi dus su mi 'dod pa rnam par bcad nas sgra 'jug par byed pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha snyad 'dogs pa po tha snyad kyi dus su mi 'dod pa rnam par bcad nas sgra 'jug par byed pa /
translated: Since the user of conventions eliminates what is not wanted at the time of using conventions and causes the engagement of the term,

original: de phyir brda yi dus na yang //
analyzed: de phyir brda yi dus na yang //
translated: therefore, even at the time of the convention,

original: gzhan sel dngos po ldog pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan sel dngos po ldog pa'o //
translated: the exclusion of other is the negation of the thing.

original: bstan pa'i don dang ji skad du bshad pa'i rang bzhin rnam par rtog pa'i don gyi gzugs brnyan dang ngo //
analyzed: bstan pa'i don dang ji skad du bshad pa'i rang bzhin rnam par rtog pa'i don gyi gzugs brnyan dang ngo //
translated: The meaning of the teaching is the form of the object of conception that is explained.

original: 'brel pa ni yang dag par ldan pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa ni yang dag par ldan pa ste /
translated: Relation is the connection.

original: der zhen pa'i dbang gis rnam par phye ba'i sgo nas rtogs pa nyid yin no //üîΩsgra las 'brel par 'gyur //
analyzed: der zhen pa'i dbang gis rnam par phye ba'i sgo nas rtogs pa nyid yin no // sgra las 'brel par 'gyur //
translated: It is the understanding that is distinguished by the power of the adherence to that.üîΩOne obtains the relation from the word.

original: sgra dang lhan cig 'brel pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra dang lhan cig 'brel pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One obtains the relation with the word.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is the form of the conceptual discrimination?

original: rang gi rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can /
analyzed: rang gi rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can /
translated: It has the result of one‚Äôs own understanding.

original: gang la don du zhen pa de las gzhan rnam par bcad pa'i dngos po'i 'bras bu can zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: gang la don du zhen pa de las gzhan rnam par bcad pa'i dngos po'i 'bras bu can zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: It has the result of the thing that is the exclusion of that which is adhered to as the object. This is the conclusion.

original: yang ci'i phyir sgra gzhan sel ba'i don sbyor bar byed kyi /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir sgra gzhan sel ba'i don sbyor bar byed kyi /
translated: Moreover, why is the meaning of the exclusion of other words applied?

original: spyi dngos por gyur pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: spyi dngos por gyur pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is the universal not a real entity?

original: gzhan du ma mthong ltos med phyir //
analyzed: gzhan du ma mthong ltos med phyir //
translated: Because it is not seen as other, and because it is not dependent.

original: brjod par bya ba'i don rnam par bcad par gyur pa la /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba'i don rnam par bcad par gyur pa la /
translated: When the object to be expressed is excluded,

original: shing la sogs pa ma yin pa gzhan la sgra ma mthong pas /
analyzed: shing la sogs pa ma yin pa gzhan la sgra ma mthong pas /
translated: the word is not seen as other, such as a tree, etc.

original: sgra las dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra las dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the thing is understood from the word.

original: la lar de mthong ba ltos phyir //
analyzed: la lar de mthong ba ltos phyir //
translated: because it is seen in some cases.

original: da ltar gyi shing la sogs pa gcig mthong ba la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: da ltar gyi shing la sogs pa gcig mthong ba la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen in some cases, such as the present tree, etc.üîΩIn that case, it is taught:

original: de skad du dngos po gang zhig de las ma mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de skad du dngos po gang zhig de las ma mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause that thing is not seen in the absence of that,

original: gang phyogs gcig la yang de las ldog pa la sgra mthong ste /
analyzed: gang phyogs gcig la yang de las ldog pa la sgra mthong ste /
translated: in one place, the sound is seen in the absence of that.

original: de las rnam par gcod pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las rnam par gcod pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: In order to teach the meaning of exclusion from that.‚Äù

original: gang gi tshe gzhan sel te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzhan sel te /
translated: When there is exclusion of other,

original: gzhan las log pa mnyan pa sgra la 'brel 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gzhan las log pa mnyan pa sgra la 'brel 'gyur ba /
translated: the hearing of the sound that is related to the exclusion from other,

original: de'i tshe cung zad kyang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe cung zad kyang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: at that time there is no contradiction at all.

original: de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na /
translated: If it were not so,

original: de ni dngos po la mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de ni dngos po la mi rung ngo //
translated: that would not be possible for things.

original: don rnam par bcad par gyur pa ni ma mthong ba la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir dang phyogs gcig mthong ba la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: don rnam par bcad par gyur pa ni ma mthong ba la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir dang phyogs gcig mthong ba la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the exclusion of the object is dependent on not seeing and dependent on seeing one part.

original: sgra 'brel pa byas pa las rtogs pa de ltar na de dag ni dngos po ste /
analyzed: sgra 'brel pa byas pa las rtogs pa de ltar na de dag ni dngos po ste /
translated: The understanding from the related sound is like that. In that case, those are things.

original: spyi dngos por gyur pa la mi rung ngo //
analyzed: spyi dngos por gyur pa la mi rung ngo //
translated: It is not possible for a universal to be a real entity.

original: de ltar na de nyid bsgrub pa'i sgo nas bstan par 'gyur @183b bas gzhan dum mthong ba don med pa can yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na de nyid bsgrub pa'i sgo nas bstan par 'gyur @183b bas gzhan dum mthong ba don med pa can yin no //
translated: Thus, it is taught that the universal is established by way of that. Otherwise, the seeing of the other would be meaningless.

original: gal te gang la sgra ma mthong ba de las rnam par gcod pa'i go bar byed pa yin par 'dod pa de ltar na gzhan la sgra ma mthong ba'i gzhung btsugs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gang la sgra ma mthong ba de las rnam par gcod pa'i go bar byed pa yin par 'dod pa de ltar na gzhan la sgra ma mthong ba'i gzhung btsugs par 'gyur te /
translated: If one asserts that the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is meant to exclude the seeing of sound in something else, then the statement of the other, the seeing of sound, would be established.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa'i sgo nas don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa'i sgo nas don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning is understood by way of the exclusion of the discordant class.

original: gal te gzhan ldog pa'i yang go bar byed pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gzhan ldog pa'i yang go bar byed pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If one says that the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is meant to exclude the other,

original: da ni spyi'i dgos pa ldog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: da ni spyi'i dgos pa ldog par 'gyur te /
translated: then the purpose of the universal would be excluded.üîΩBecause the purpose is completely fulfilled by the mere understanding of the meaning as excluded from the other.

original: don rnams gzhan las ldog pa rtogs pa tsam gyis dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro zhes mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: don rnams gzhan las ldog pa rtogs pa tsam gyis dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro zhes mang du bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained many times.

original: gang gi phyir da lta yin pa de'i phyir rigs sogs de ldan dag /
analyzed: gang gi phyir da lta yin pa de'i phyir rigs sogs de ldan dag /
translated: Because it is so, it is correct to say that the universal is possessed by that which possesses it, such as the pot.

original: rigs dang yon tan dang las kyi bye brag khyad par can nyid du mngon par 'dod pa dag dbang po'i yul gyi don la yod min te /
analyzed: rigs dang yon tan dang las kyi bye brag khyad par can nyid du mngon par 'dod pa dag dbang po'i yul gyi don la yod min te /
translated: Those who desire to be distinguished by specific types of caste, qualities, and actions do not exist in the object of the sense faculties.

original: sna tshogs par snang ba can gyi blo med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sna tshogs par snang ba can gyi blo med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no cognition that appears as various things.üîΩAnd those who possess caste, etc. do not exist in the object, because of the non-existence of the object.

original: de dang ldan pa dag ste rigs la sogs pa dang ldan pa dag kyang don la yod pa ma yin na gang kho na las 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa des don la'am rigs la sogs pa de dag la'am /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa dag ste rigs la sogs pa dang ldan pa dag kyang don la yod pa ma yin na gang kho na las 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa des don la'am rigs la sogs pa de dag la'am /
translated: How could one listen to those who are the basis of the reason for the connection, to those objects, to those castes, etc.,

original: de dang 'brel pa de dag la mnyan par 'gyur /
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa de dag la mnyan par 'gyur /
translated: or to those who are connected with them?

original: gang gis na de dag med pa de bas na dan la yang ma yin zhing /üîΩrigs la sogs pa de dang 'brel pa /
analyzed: gang gis na de dag med pa de bas na dan la yang ma yin zhing / rigs la sogs pa de dang 'brel pa /
translated: Since they do not exist, one should not listen to them.

original: de la'ang sgra tha snyad kyi dus mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: de la'ang sgra tha snyad kyi dus mi sbyor ro //
translated: And one should not apply the term to those who are connected with those castes, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩgzhan las ldog pa la /üîΩsgra rnams nyid ni sbyor phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / gzhan las ldog pa la / sgra rnams nyid ni sbyor phyir ro //
translated: Why is that?üîΩBecause the terms are applied to the exclusion of other.

original: nyid kyi sgra ni rim pa gzhan du sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: nyid kyi sgra ni rim pa gzhan du sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The word ‚Äújust‚Äù should be applied in a different order:

original: gzhan las ldog pa kho na la sgra rnams sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa kho na la sgra rnams sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that words are applied only to what is other than that.

original: de yang gong du bsgrubs zin pa de ltar na yang mi brjod do //
analyzed: de yang gong du bsgrubs zin pa de ltar na yang mi brjod do //
translated: And that has already been established above.

original: rgyu de nyid kyi phyir rigs la sogs pa sgras brjod pa ma yin zhing des khyad par can du gyur pa'i don 'dzin par byed pa yang dbang po'i shes pa ma yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: rgyu de nyid kyi phyir rigs la sogs pa sgras brjod pa ma yin zhing des khyad par can du gyur pa'i don 'dzin par byed pa yang dbang po'i shes pa ma yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: For that very reason, it is shown that the sense faculties do not apprehend universals, etc., nor do they apprehend objects qualified by them.

original: de bas na 'dir yang mdor bsdu na rtog pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de bas na 'dir yang mdor bsdu na rtog pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Therefore, in brief, there are three types of conceptualization here:

original: rigs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / sgra'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / sgra'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: conceptualization of universals, etc., conceptualization of relations, and conceptualization of words.

original: de lar zhig rnam par rtog pa snga ma dag ni sngar bshad pa'i rgyu nyid kyis yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lar zhig rnam par rtog pa snga ma dag ni sngar bshad pa'i rgyu nyid kyis yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Of these, the former two conceptualizations do not exist due to the reasons already explained.

original: sgra'i rnam par rtog pa 'ba' zhig kho na yod pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i rnam par rtog pa 'ba' zhig kho na yod pa yin te /
translated: Only conceptualization of words exists.

original: 'dis ni don rjes su 'brel ba 'dzin pa de brda dran pa'i rgyu can te /
analyzed: 'dis ni don rjes su 'brel ba 'dzin pa de brda dran pa'i rgyu can te /
translated: This apprehends objects connected with words, and it is caused by the memory of signs.

original: brda'i dran pa ni brda dran pa ste /
analyzed: brda'i dran pa ni brda dran pa ste /
translated: The memory of the sign is the memory of the sign.

original: 'dzin pa gang @184a * //
analyzed: 'dzin pa gang @184a * //
translated: The retention is the retention of the sign.

original: la de nyid kyi rgyu yod pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //üîΩmthong ba bsre byed bdag nyid can //
analyzed: la de nyid kyi rgyu yod pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro // mthong ba bsre byed bdag nyid can //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe cause of that‚Äù is to be supplied.üîΩIt is the nature of mixing what is seen.

original: de'i 'dzin pas sgra mthong ba sbyor bar byed pa'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: de'i 'dzin pas sgra mthong ba sbyor bar byed pa'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: The retention is the nature of mixing the sound and the seen.

original: ji ltar sgra 'di ni don rjod par byed pa yin par sngar thob pa de rjes su dran nas /
analyzed: ji ltar sgra 'di ni don rjod par byed pa yin par sngar thob pa de rjes su dran nas /
translated: Having remembered the former acquisition that this sound is the expression of the object,

original: da ltar gyi don dang rjes su sbyor ba de bas na de 'dzin par 'gyur gyi rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: da ltar gyi don dang rjes su sbyor ba de bas na de 'dzin par 'gyur gyi rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: it is now connected with the present object. Therefore, the retention is of that, not of another aspect.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i 'dzin pa gang yin pa /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i 'dzin pa gang yin pa /
translated: The retention is of that kind.

original: mig shes la ste dbang po'i shes pa la /
analyzed: mig shes la ste dbang po'i shes pa la /
translated: It is in the eye consciousness, in the sense consciousness.

original: de ji ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ji ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: mig la brten pa'i shes pa yang ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: mig la brten pa'i shes pa yang ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is the nature of the consciousness that is based on the eye?

original: snga phyir rtogs pas stong ba yi //
analyzed: snga phyir rtogs pas stong ba yi //
translated: It is empty of prior and subsequent realizations.

original: sngar de 'angs  pa dang phyi ma steng ltar ba de dag gi rtogs pa ni sngon nyams su myong brjod par byed pa dran pa de las der zhen pas da ltar gyi don de de'i brjod par bya ba nyid du 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: sngar de 'angs  pa dang phyi ma steng ltar ba de dag gi rtogs pa ni sngon nyams su myong brjod par byed pa dran pa de las der zhen pas da ltar gyi don de de'i brjod par bya ba nyid du 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The understanding of those is the memory that expresses the experience of those in the past. Now, the object is grasped as just the expression of that, because of attachment to that.

original: don snga phyir rtogs pas sgra sbyor bar bya /
analyzed: don snga phyir rtogs pas sgra sbyor bar bya /
translated: The sound is applied by the understanding of the object in the past and future.

original: de 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni des nga ltar gyi don tsam 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i shes pa des stong pa de bas na dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir de brjod pa dang / ma 'dres pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni des nga ltar gyi don tsam 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i shes pa des stong pa de bas na dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir de brjod pa dang / ma 'dres pa nyid yin no //
translated: That which is like that is empty of the sense consciousness that grasps just the object of that kind. Therefore, because of the absence of that, the expression and the unmixedness are just that.

original: sbyor ba yang gang zhig byed pa gang la nus pa med pa de ni byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba yang gang zhig byed pa gang la nus pa med pa de ni byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Also, what is the application? That which is powerless with regard to what is done is not the doer,

original: dbang po'i rnam bar shes pa 'das pa dran pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam bar shes pa 'das pa dran pa lta bu'o //
translated: like the memory of the past sense consciousness.

original: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa yang snga phyir rtogs pa'i sgo nas don bsre ba'i bdag nyid can gyi sbyor ba'i bya ba byed par nus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa yang snga phyir rtogs pa'i sgo nas don bsre ba'i bdag nyid can gyi sbyor ba'i bya ba byed par nus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
translated: Also, the sense consciousnesses are not able to perform the function of combining objects through the process of prior and subsequent cognition.

original: gzhan yang / gzhan la 'jug sems can gyi yang //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gzhan la 'jug sems can gyi yang //
translated: Moreover, the mind that engages other objects

original: mig gis gzugs dag mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mig gis gzugs dag mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: also sees forms with the eye.

original: mngon du 'gyur ba'i don las 'das pa la sogs pa'i don gzhan la sems 'jug pa can gyi yang ste /
analyzed: mngon du 'gyur ba'i don las 'das pa la sogs pa'i don gzhan la sems 'jug pa can gyi yang ste /
translated: The mind that engages other objects, such as the object of the past,üîΩalso sees forms with the eye.

original: 'das pa la sogs pa rang gi ming dang bsres nas rtog pa na yang /
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa rang gi ming dang bsres nas rtog pa na yang /
translated: When it is conceptualized by mixing the past, etc., with its name,

original: da ltar gyi gzugs la sogs pa mig gi dbang po'i shes pas mthong zhing 'dzin par byed kyi /
analyzed: da ltar gyi gzugs la sogs pa mig gi dbang po'i shes pas mthong zhing 'dzin par byed kyi /
translated: the eye sense consciousness sees and apprehends present forms, etc.

original: rnam par rtog pa des don de mthong ba ma yin no zhes rtogs par mi nus te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa des don de mthong ba ma yin no zhes rtogs par mi nus te /
translated: It is not possible to understand that the object is seen by that conceptual consciousness.

original: des 'angs  pa'i don rjod par byed pa bor nas da ltar gyi don ming dang sbyar nas 'jug par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des 'angs  pa'i don rjod par byed pa bor nas da ltar gyi don ming dang sbyar nas 'jug par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that one would abandon the expression of the meaning of the past and engage in the present by connecting it with the name.

original: da ltar gyi don ming dang bsre ba can yin pa de'i tshe rnam par rtog pa gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: da ltar gyi don ming dang bsre ba can yin pa de'i tshe rnam par rtog pa gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
translated: When the present object is connected with the name, there is no other conceptualization,

original: rnam par rtog pa nyid gcig car mi 'jug pa'i @184b phyir ro //üîΩmthong ba'i rang bzhin can yod na yang de mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa nyid gcig car mi 'jug pa'i @184b phyir ro // mthong ba'i rang bzhin can yod na yang de mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because conceptualization itself does not operate simultaneously.üîΩEven if it did have the nature of seeing, it would not apprehend it, because it does not apprehend the name of the object that appears.

original: de brda mi 'dzin snang bar gyur pa'i don gyi ming mi 'dzin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de brda mi 'dzin snang bar gyur pa'i don gyi ming mi 'dzin pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it does not apprehend the name of the object that appears,

original: da ltar gyi yul 'dzin pa'i dus na gsal ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: da ltar gyi yul 'dzin pa'i dus na gsal ba nyid yin te /
translated: at the time of apprehending the present object it is clear.

original: de la mngon sum ni rtog pa med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba de skad du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la mngon sum ni rtog pa med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba de skad du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus it is understood that direct perception is nonconceptual.

original: de bas na de skyes /
analyzed: de bas na de skyes /
translated: Therefore, when it arises,

original: de'i ming 'dzin par 'byung bar yang rtog pa yin /
analyzed: de'i ming 'dzin par 'byung bar yang rtog pa yin /
translated: it is conceptual in that it arises as the apprehension of the name.

original: gal te de'i ming 'dzin pa de de la yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te de'i ming 'dzin pa de de la yod pa ma yin na /
translated: If the apprehension of the name did not exist in it,üîΩthen it would not be conceptual.

original: 'o na ni ming de 'dzin par 'byung pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: 'o na ni ming de 'dzin par 'byung pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: But if the name does not exist, then the conceptual thought that apprehends the name also does not exist.

original: dbang po'i shes pa rtog pa med pa nyid du grub pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa rtog pa med pa nyid du grub pa yin no //
translated: Thus it is established that the sense consciousnesses are nonconceptual.

original: gzhan yang gang la sgra na nges 'god pa ming gis yul de la rnam rtog skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan yang gang la sgra na nges 'god pa ming gis yul de la rnam rtog skye bar 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, when a name is applied to an object, a conceptual thought arises with regard to that object.

original: dbang po'i spyod yul tha snyad kyi dus su nye bar sbyor pa'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa la sgra 'god pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dbang po'i spyod yul tha snyad kyi dus su nye bar sbyor pa'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa la sgra 'god pa ma yin gyi /
translated: But a name is not applied to an object that is not the domain of the sense consciousnesses at the time of conventional activity.

original: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pa'i yul nyid la yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pa'i yul nyid la yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Rather, a name is applied to the object of conceptual thought.

original: ci ste yang dbang po'i yul nyid la sgra 'god par 'gyur ba de'i che /
analyzed: ci ste yang dbang po'i yul nyid la sgra 'god par 'gyur ba de'i che /
translated: But if a name is applied to the object of the sense consciousnesses, then what?

original: des na sgra'i don gyi yul can nyid yin pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
analyzed: des na sgra'i don gyi yul can nyid yin pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
translated: Because the object of the name is the object of the sense consciousness,

original: dbang skyes kyi shes pa rnam par rtog pa bzhin du 'jug 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang skyes kyi shes pa rnam par rtog pa bzhin du 'jug 'gyur ro //
translated: the sense consciousness would engage its object in the same way that conceptual consciousness does.

original: gal te yang 'gyur ba nyid yin no zhes /
analyzed: gal te yang 'gyur ba nyid yin no zhes /
translated: But if you say that it does engage its object in that way,

original: de de ltar yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de de ltar yod pa ma yin te /
translated: that is not the case.

original: yon tan yang 'dod pas 'jug pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi don nye ba la ltos pa med par dbang bo las skyes pa'i shes pa'i phyi rol gyi don mthong ba min na phyi rol gyi don yang mthong par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yon tan yang 'dod pas 'jug pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi don nye ba la ltos pa med par dbang bo las skyes pa'i shes pa'i phyi rol gyi don mthong ba min na phyi rol gyi don yang mthong par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is the desire for the object that causes the sense-faculty to engage in activity, if the sense-faculty does not see the external object without relying on the proximity of the external object, then the external object would also be seen by the sense-faculty.

original: de'i phyir de'i yul la sbyor bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i yul la sbyor bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would not be connected to the object.

original: dbang po las skyes pa'i shes pa de dag sgra'i don ci yul can ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa'i shes pa de dag sgra'i don ci yul can ma yin te /
translated: Those cognitions that arise from the sense-faculties do not have sound as their object,

original: sgra dang don 'das pa la sogs pa de dag de la yang brda byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra dang don 'das pa la sogs pa de dag de la yang brda byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the word and the object are past, etc.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig 'das na yan gar 'gyur bde ni de'i rang bzhin la nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig 'das na yan gar 'gyur bde ni de'i rang bzhin la nges pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is connected to the past is not its nature, because it is not ascertained.

original: dper na mar me med na yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mar me med na yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yod pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, even when there is no lamp, there is auditory consciousness.

original: sgra 'gog pa yang spyod yul gyi dngos po 'das pa dang zhig pa la sogs pas dbang po'i yul las 'das na yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: sgra 'gog pa yang spyod yul gyi dngos po 'das pa dang zhig pa la sogs pas dbang po'i yul las 'das na yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
translated: Sound is also stopped when the object of the sense faculty has passed or been destroyed and so forth.

original: de bas na sgra dang 'dres pa'i don 'dzin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na sgra dang 'dres pa'i don 'dzin pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that the object is apprehended as mixed with sound.

original: gzhan yang gal te rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid mngon sum yin pa de'i tshe /üîΩskyes bu 'di gzugs @185a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid mngon sum yin pa de'i tshe / skyes bu 'di gzugs @185a * //
translated: Moreover, if it is the case that conceptual cognition is perception,

original: la mngon du phyogs par gyur pa na /
analyzed: la mngon du phyogs par gyur pa na /
translated: then when this person is facing a form,

original: gzugs gzugs zhes ni mthong bar 'gyur //üîΩde'i tshe de'i yul can gzugs la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can gyi /
analyzed: gzugs gzugs zhes ni mthong bar 'gyur // de'i tshe de'i yul can gzugs la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can gyi /
translated: he would see the form as ‚Äúform.‚Äù

original: blo mthong ba ci zhig yin /
analyzed: blo mthong ba ci zhig yin /
translated: At that time, what is the cognition that has the mode of apprehending form and so on as its object?

original: mthong pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not seeing.

original: de de ltar na rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gzugs nyid 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de de ltar na rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gzugs nyid 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: In that case, because the conceptual cognition engages only form,

original: gzugs nyid mngon sum yin par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzugs nyid mngon sum yin par 'gyur //
translated: form would be perception.

original: de'i shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But its cognition would not be.

original: gal te shes pa la yang de bzhin du de 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te shes pa la yang de bzhin du de 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that consciousness is the same way, that is, that it is engaged in itself,

original: gzugs bzhin du gzugs mthong ba la yang rnam par rtog pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs bzhin du gzugs mthong ba la yang rnam par rtog pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: then, as in the case of form, there is no conceptualization in the seeing of form.

original: de'i nyams myong yod na yang med do zhes brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i nyams myong yod na yang med do zhes brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: And you cannot say that there is no experience of it.

original: de ltar mthong ba la nyams su myong ba ma grub pas nga'i gzugs mthong ba ni de nyid yin zhing nga'i gzugs mthong ba ni 'di yin no zhes khyod 'dod pa mngon sum rtog pa dang bcas pa yang 'jug par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: de ltar mthong ba la nyams su myong ba ma grub pas nga'i gzugs mthong ba ni de nyid yin zhing nga'i gzugs mthong ba ni 'di yin no zhes khyod 'dod pa mngon sum rtog pa dang bcas pa yang 'jug par mi 'gyur na /
translated: Thus, since the experience of seeing is not established, you cannot engage in the conceptualization of direct perception, namely, ‚ÄúMy seeing of form is just this‚Äù and ‚ÄúMy seeing of form is just that.‚Äù

original: rnam par rtog pa de yang snang ngo //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de yang snang ngo //
translated: And that conceptualization also appears.

original: de bas na da'i nyams su myong ba yod pa de ltar na mi 'dod bzhin du khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na da'i nyams su myong ba yod pa de ltar na mi 'dod bzhin du khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, you must accept, even if you do not want to, that there is an experience of it.

original: de bas na de nyams su myong ba ni mi rtog pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na de nyams su myong ba ni mi rtog pa yin te /
translated: Thus, the experience of it is nonconceptual.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir dang / de mngon sum nyid ma yin na don mngon sum nyid ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir dang / de mngon sum nyid ma yin na don mngon sum nyid ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the faults explained above would exist, and because if it is not itself a direct perception, it follows that its object is not a direct perception.

original: rnam par rtog pa yang gzugs 'dzin pa'i dus na gzugs mthong ba la mi dmigs pa des na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yang gzugs 'dzin pa'i dus na gzugs mthong ba la mi dmigs pa des na /
translated: And if it is conceptual, then when it apprehends form, it does not observe the seeing of form.

original: de ni nyams su myong ba gzugs kyi blo de ni khyod kyi gzhung gis ji ltar rtog med 'gyur /
analyzed: de ni nyams su myong ba gzugs kyi blo de ni khyod kyi gzhung gis ji ltar rtog med 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could that cognition of form, which is your experience, be nonconceptual, according to your theory?

original: gal te mngon sum rtog pa med pa yin par mi 'gyur na rtog pa med pa yang yin par 'gyur pa de bas na rtog pa med pa kho na mngon sum yin no//
analyzed: gal te mngon sum rtog pa med pa yin par mi 'gyur na rtog pa med pa yang yin par 'gyur pa de bas na rtog pa med pa kho na mngon sum yin no//
translated: If it were not a nonconceptual direct perception, it would not be a direct perception. Therefore, it is only nonconceptual cognition that is a direct perception.

original: de nyid kyis myong yin na ni //
analyzed: de nyid kyis myong yin na ni //
translated: If it is the experience of that itself,

original: gzugs kyi blo gang gis gzugs gzugs zhes rnam par rtog pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i don 'dzin bar byed do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi blo gang gis gzugs gzugs zhes rnam par rtog pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i don 'dzin bar byed do //
translated: then the cognition of form is the cognition that apprehends the object that is associated with the conceptual thought ‚Äúform is form.‚Äù

original: blo de nyid kyis nyams su myong ba yin na /
analyzed: blo de nyid kyis nyams su myong ba yin na /
translated: If it is the experience of that cognition itself,üîΩthen it is not a direct perception.

original: blo'i bdag nyid de nyid kyang gzugs mthong pa gzugs mthong ba zhes 'dzin par byed par yin no zhes khas len na rnam par rtog pa nyid mthong ba nyams su myong ba de nyid mi 'thad do //
analyzed: blo'i bdag nyid de nyid kyang gzugs mthong pa gzugs mthong ba zhes 'dzin par byed par yin no zhes khas len na rnam par rtog pa nyid mthong ba nyams su myong ba de nyid mi 'thad do //
translated: If you accept that the nature of cognition itself is what apprehends the seeing of form, then it is untenable that the very experience of seeing is a conception.

original: de ltar na yul dang de nyams su myong ba la /
analyzed: de ltar na yul dang de nyams su myong ba la /
translated: Thus, with regard to the object and the experience of it,

original: rtog pa gnyis cig car mthong ba'i blo 'jug pa dmigs pa med na /
analyzed: rtog pa gnyis cig car mthong ba'i blo 'jug pa dmigs pa med na /
translated: if the cognition that sees the two conceptions simultaneously does not observe them,

original: gang gis na de ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis na de ltar 'gyur /
translated: how could it be like that?

original: de ni gzugs kyi blo'i yul dang rang nyams su myong ba @185b dag gi rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid gnyis cig car 'jug par mi rung bas na bstan pa yin /
analyzed: de ni gzugs kyi blo'i yul dang rang nyams su myong ba @185b dag gi rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid gnyis cig car 'jug par mi rung bas na bstan pa yin /
translated: That is to say, it is taught that it is not tenable for the two conceptions‚Äîthe object of the cognition of form and the experience of it‚Äîto occur simultaneously.

original: lan brjod pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lan brjod pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: This is the response that should be understood.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: dus mtshungs rnam par shes gzhan gyis nyams myong //
analyzed: dus mtshungs rnam par shes gzhan gyis nyams myong //
translated: The experience is by another cognition that is simultaneous with it.
